story:
Introducing HAMAC

 

A Revolutionary Coffee Device.
Give you both the attributes of manual and electric grinders.
Make grinding coffee a simple pleasure.
The best-tasting coffee starts with HAMAC.

 

 

HAMAC Attributes

 

How HAMAC achieves this

 

Automatic grind

It ensures consistent grinds. Consistency produces uniform coffee grounds which encourages the best extraction of volatile flavors and aromatics trapped inside every coffee bean¹. Manual grinders are always stuck with poor grind uniformity. By automating a manual grinder, similar to expensive electric grinders, HAMAC provides uniform and precise grinds to contribute even size.

 

 

Coffee Flavour Wheel. Adapted from that of the Specialty Coffee Association of America¹

 

Perfect Low Speed

Conventional electric machines, especially those with lower prices running at higher rotation speeds, can cause a lot of friction which results in overheating or oxidizing the beans. This ultimately degrades the flavors and causes static problems. HAMAC is designed to simulate a comparable hand grinding speed of 30 RPM² so that only minimal heat builds up and is transferred to the coffee beans. Every coffee bean has hundreds of flavors and aromatics looked¹. HAMAC releases the full flavor and aromatic potential in every cup of coffee, making your coffee delicious.

 

²RPM= Rotations per Minute

 

Simple Operation

Same as electric coffee grinders, it simply requires a push of the button to start HAMAC. It is a convenient & simple way to prepare a cup of great coffee. Grinding coffee by hand for a single cup is easy but tiring and time consuming for a group of people, especially if you want fine grinds.

 

 

Weight and Size

We have designed HAMAC so that you can hold it with one hand and can take it anywhere. HAMAC’s light-weight of 350 g combined with dimensions of 144*53*61 mm makes it easy to travel with. Slip it into your backpack or luggage and everything you love about great coffee can be enjoyed anywhere.

 

 

Continuous Refinements

Most affordable electric coffee grinders are too fast to burn the beans and those quality electric burr grinders cost hundreds or even sometimes thousands to spend. Through continuous refinements of materials, processes, and performance, HAMAC yields the same consistent grind size at a small fraction of the price of electric burr grinders. 

 

 

Simulation of Hand Grinding

Most electric coffee grinders make a lot of noise, which is not ideal and unbearable for a family setting. HAMAC grinding coffee at 30 RPM generates a low and quiet level of 65dB, providing no disturbance.

 

 

 

Compatibility

It can be used with your existing hand grinder. HAMAC adds power to it.

 

 

Ergonomic Design

HAMAC is a handheld device and the feel in the hand is of utmost importance. It's ergonomic grip handle and light-weight provide comfort while holding it.

 

Comparison Chart

 

HAMAC gives everything you asked for with regards to coffee grinding.

 

 

Featured in

 

 

 

Lifestyle

 

HAMAC contributes to café-quality cups of coffee.    

     

 

 

How to Use

 

 

Hand Grinder For Combo

 

 

PERKS

 

    

    

 

 

Technical Breakdown

 

What does HAMAC include

The package includes a HAMAC, a  power adapter and a manual to get you started.

 

Functional Parts

 

  

 

Specifications

 

 

Why Develop HAMAC?

 

All of our team members are passionate about coffee and its culture but unhappy like other coffee lovers with the problems of both current manual and electric coffee grinders. We set out to handle what we consider to be the key failures of most hand and electric grinders available today. Thanks to our team, we have worked out a revolutionary device, HAMAC. It benefits coffee enthusiasts both the attributes of manual and electric grinders. It’s about helping everybody make better coffee with fewer unknowns in the equation.

Our design objectives: HAMAC has both the benefits of manual and electric grinders- consistent grinding, hand grinding speed, convenient, portable, hand grinding speed, compact and lightweight.

We need your help to start and to make HAMAC a reality. Support us by clicking the ‘Back This Project’ button below. We’re thrilled to have you on this journey. By backing and sharing our campaign we will be able to fund the initial molding, tooling, materials, and production of the HAMAC Energizer.

 

 

Our Long Journey

 

1. Proof of Concept and Functionality

a. Research and test current manual and electric grinders:

 

b. Test and analyze the functionality of gear motors: Test the speed, weight, and torque of 10       RPM, 30RPM and 80RPM gear motors to determine the most efficient in the balance of size, weight, and function. 30 RPM has been chosen accordingly.

 

2. Make, test and analyze the prototypes for functional and appearance improvements:

a. Dimensions and materials of the housing: ABS?
b. Dimensions and materials of powder cover: ABS? Silicone?
c. Grinding time: within 4 minutes for 30g?
d. Noise levels: below hand grinder level 70?
e. Arrange 3D print models based on the dimensions of drawings.

 

f. Final prototype performance:

  • Grinding time: 4 minutes for 40g
  • Weight: 350g
  • Size: length 145mm/height 60mm/width 53mm
  • dB level: 65-67
  • Housing: ABS plastics for its great resistance to heavy use and adverse environmental conditions.
  • Powder Cover: Silicone rubber for its excellent resistance to extreme temperatures he tensile strength, tear strength, elongation, and compression.

3. Planned to use injection molding for housing. Based on the refinements of prototypes, we have finished the CAD files.

 

 

4. Next steps: We are ready to

a. refine our prototypes.
b. start the injection molding for housing and parts.
c. refine the bill of materials.
d. make and test production prototype and further refinements.
e. start production.

 

²Researches:

Noise Levels, Safe Environments, Australia

Motor Speeds Explained: Diving into AC and DC Motors, Groschopp, Inc.

Gearmotor Sizing Guide, Bison Gear & Engineering Corp.

 

OUR TIMELINE

 

Bringing HAMAC to Life

 

Manufacturing

 

Over the years, we haveclosely tied with a partner factory in China with great experience and expertise in manufacturing, and good delivery records. The factory is equipped with full-scale facilities mainly including high-speed mounters, re-flow soldering system, automatic bonders, wave soldering, and injection molding machines.

 

About Us

 

Stones Co., Limited was established in 2016 and has been dedicated towards the development of innovative electronic products and solutions with added value. 

Our team consists of experienced electronics engineers, mechanical engineers, product designers, and IT and logistics specialists. Most importantly, we are a team of coffee lovers. Our love for coffee has led us to search the global marketplace for a coffee device that can solve both the problems of conventional manual and electric grinders at the same time. After discovering that there was no existing product, the idea for HAMAC was born. We set off on a mission to develop a no-compromise device that we know all coffee lovers will be proud to begin their day with. For the past year, we have turned our concept into a reality.  Please be part of our journey. Be among the first to have this innovative product. We appreciate any help and support we can get on this journey!  

 

Please Don’t Wait

 

Help HAMAC make a difference in coffee grinding by clicking the ‘Back This Project’ Button, and helping us spread the words by sharing our page.

 

 

 

Risks and Challenges

What you see here is a fully functional pre-production model. It is close to the final product except for housing refinements.

As with any hardware project, there are natural risks and challenges in engineering and manufacturing. We've done a lot to minimize risks for backers: We have completed generations of prototypes that have demonstrated all the key functionality and appearance. These help to minimize any potential issues that may come up. Accordingly, we have completed our design for manufacturing processes so that we have a clear vision of how long it takes from when the various components reach us and the final product reaches your door.

 

Contact Us

 

     852 6222 2868

     m.me/STHamac

     cs@hamac.coffee

     https://www.facebook.com/STHamac/

     http://hamac.coffee/

story:
COOM ENERGY is a powdered, scoopable gaming supplement that is mixed with water or with milk, developed to promote brain function and alertness, without relying on overuse of caffeine.

OUR MAIN GOALS:

1. Prove that caffeine isn't the only thing to live by.

2. Improve on what the world has to offer young adults to drink, by making something delicious that is NOT largely considered a health risk.

3. Help both gaming & adult streamers in an industry that largely takes advantage of them.

Based on the market and beverage research here at Coom Brothers Limited, we noticed one running theme, the caffeine content in supposed 'gaming supplements' had close to if not THE daily limit of caffeine for an adult in a single serving in many cases, which is disappointing, not to mention dangerous and ineffective in the long term. We aim to normalise safer beverage options for the gaming and streaming world, as opposed to reinventing the wheel!

"What is your formula, and what can you ACTUALLY bring to the table?"

The answer at this point is that our formula is a unique blend of Nootropics & Multivitamins SPECIFICALLY designed to support your mind and to

reduce eye strain and RSI!

So many supplements on the internet promise so much, and yet they are packed full of unnecessary things that our body already produces from normal food and normal dietary structures, this is common in protein shakes and so called "gamer energy".

We're fine, thanks!

(Although with YOUR help, we can create our first flavours, and bring them to YOUR doorstep before the end of the year! We have already spoken with our guys working on formulating the exciting new blend of supplement, and we have to say, its exciting!)

Here are the first 3 FLAVOURS we have planned!

At the Coom Brothers we really want to bring to light the importance of keeping your mental health in check as a daily computer user, and that includes KEEPING TRACK OF WHAT GOES INTO YOUR BODY.

FAR TOO MANY companies take advantage of the industry and pack their products full of sweeteners, caffeine and chemicals that we should not be ingesting, and with mental health becoming a bigger and bigger worldwide dilemma, we want to step up.

With our current pre-emptive business model, shoppers will be able to send 5% of each purchase to one of our mental health charity choices as a company, we currently are making sure that we have the right choices before moving forwards as we are aware that some charities do not make as much of a difference as others. (We are looking forward to meetings going forwards once funding is complete).

story:
Overview

We are building our first production kitchen with a mini retail corner in Giswil (Obwalden, Switzerland).  We would like to share our Keto bakeries and desserts with as many people as possible and be able to bring these foods fresher and faster to everyone.

We need your help.

#buildourkitchen #linswitzerland

Follow us here, our website and social media for updates on this project

Website: www.lin-switzerland.com

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/linswitzerland/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LinSwitzerland

Campaign Summary

Lin Switzerland is an online keto bakery and dessert shop based in Switzerland, founded by Lin Chong, a certified keto lifestyle coach.  We dedicate ourselves to creating delicious and nutritious keto-friendly food that can be enjoyed by people who are on a low-carb / keto way of eating. Some of them have health conditions such as diabetes, sugar and gluten sensitivities etc.,  that prevent them from enjoying traditional bakeries.  

Currently, we are operating out of our home kitchen and we deliver all over Switzerland.  We have been doing this since December 2020.  Thanks to everyone's support, the bakery has become really busy! It is clear that we will no longer be able to meet the demands of our customers with our current set-up.  

In order to grow Lin Switzerland, we have decided to set up a production kitchen where we can hire some part-time bakers to help us scale the production up.  For example, the demand for our Keto Vegan Wraps has been so good we have to limit the quantities we can produce weekly.  With the production kitchen and part-time bakers, we will be able to fulfill everyone's desire for the wraps and more!

At the same time, we will create a mini retail corner where people can come by to pick up their orders or buy freshly baked breads and desserts.  We plan to open the mini retail once or twice a week to start.  

Finally, as requested by many customers, we will also hire some part-time help to translate our website into German, French and Italian. These freelancers will also provide customer service support in these languages.

What We Need & What You Get

We would like to raise CHF25,000 through this campaign.  The money will be used for:

  • Furniture and fixtures 
  • Ovens, refrigerators and freezers
  • Baking equipment
  • Display shelves
  • Cost of translating the website into German, French and Italian

We are offering our supporters wonderful perks ranging from surprise boxes to discount cards and coaching packages.

In case we do not reach our funding goal, the project will still go ahead. We will grow slower and take more time to come up to the level of production that we would like to.  The space has already been leased and we will start moving in slowly in the first week of July 2021. The address is Panoramastrasse 18, 6074 Giswil. 

The Impact

Your contribution is of utmost importance. No contribution is too small and our appreciation is immense for whatever you wish to support us with. 

Lin Switzerland was started on a shoe-string and without an injection of funds, our growth is of course possible but very slow.  There is a real need in the market for keto products, not just for weight loss but also for weight gain (yes!) and more importantly to manage many medical conditions. 

It gives us so much joy to see people so happy with these treats they are getting from us. We would like to continue doing so, and to also be able to innovate. In order to innovate, we need to make our production more efficient.  The new production kitchen will help us do exactly that.

Risks & Challenges

Baking burnout! We really need to hire more bakers so we can get some sleep :-)

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to donate monetarily you can still lend a hand. By simply passing this campaign on to your friends you are helping considerably. Many thanks!!!

story:
Thanks to the team at Hudson Marlowe for the video
www.HudsonMarlowe.com

 

The quick story ...

Oh - How we’ve missed you!

It’s been just over two years since we closed our location at Bayswater, and even though we’ve seen a lot of our customers and neighbours at our various pop up events since then, we’ve missed actively being in, and contributing to the amazing community we love!

We’re really hoping to bring Hintonburger back home this spring for a season of great burgers, fries and a side of community.

But we really need your help

 

The longer story ...
Who we are & how we've come to this point:

When we first opened up in our little shack in the neighbourhood, we were quite overwhelmed by the support and love that we received. It seemed as it was the desire of our friends and neighbours to help us succeed.

It was thanks to our neighbours and supporters, that we received numerous accolades including being voted ‘Ottawa’s BEST Burger’ many times ... a reputation that we are committed to uphold and we strive for with each and every burger we make. We’ve been featured in newspapers, online blogs, books, radio, social media, local and national TV – all because of YOU and your support. Seriously - You lined up for us, you endured long wait times and you came with us to a few location moves as we grew! Your unwavering love and support kept us going for all these years!!!

Hintonburger was always eager to return the favour. We fed thousands of meals at our monthly neighbourhood breakfasts, raised money for local charities, donated food to various groups, fundraisers and more. We hired and trained local folks with barriers to employment. From day one, community involvement has been a top commitment and reward for the burger business that bears this great neighbourhoods name.

We love being in, and contributing to Hintonburg!

So - What happened?

Let’s summarize the last couple years quickly, and get back to the feel-good excitement of the relaunch!

After out-growing the shack, we moved to our second location. It was great but as time went on we then outgrew that location. Our last move, although a larger location had a lot of issues, including several robberies. It really just didn’t have the same vibe, then we started noticing a dip in sales, and to be honest, all these issues compounded and we got depressed. We were given an offer for early termination of our lease and we accepted, took a few weeks to clear our heads and spotted another location. It was too good to be true and soon that location fell apart, so without an ideal location we would miss the busiest months of the year.

At that point, we decided to reorganize and put plans and focus into coming back fresh and revitalized in the spring of 2020. See where this is going? We finished final negotiations and secured a location on March 10th 2020. A few days later on March 13th, lockdown was announced, thus dashing those hopes of reopening. With the restrictions in place we parted ways |and watched with heavy hearts as our friends pivoted and adapted constantly through the year. We hit the drawing board, and decided that it was best to wait, again, for spring 2021.

Still we missed it ...missed you. Thanks to the help of some friends, we were happy and excited to present a series of well received pop-up events, but wanted to do more.

This brings us to here.

What we need...

and what we’ll give YOU in return:

We have a solid plan which brings us back to the basics, or back to the shack style as it was, having a good time delivering great tasting, high quality, fresh handmade burgers using locally sourced ingredients and giving back to our community and supporters.

First of all - We have secured a new ‘home’ for Hintonburger

For now, we need to keep the location quiet until we meet our goal and can be sure we are able to relaunch as planned. What we can say is that while restrictions continue to be announced and changed and things seem uncertain, we have a great new location – one that will be able to adapt quickly to any restrictions that may happen or change to help ensure we can serve our delicious burgers no matter what.

We’ve also gathered and sourced great deals on most of the equipment and supplies we need to get up and running. A lot of time and funds have already been invested by the partners to help make this plan come to fruition.

We really need your support - Hintonburger needs to raise $6k to get going.

How will we use the funds raised here:

  • Kitchen equipment & installation (fryers, sinks, prep tables, fridges)
  • Licenses, fees & insurance
  • Kitchen Reno and decor
  • Initial food orders with our local suppliers and farmers

We’ve put together a fun set of rewards perks for our contributors.

Everything from stickers, shirts, burgers to some very limited and exclusive options.

Want to donate ... and you have a special reward in mind that we haven’t listed?
We’re flexible, open for options and into collaboration – so drop us an email and let us know.

Other Ways You Can Help

Don’t forget that if you can’t contribute on this fundraising campaign or take advantage of the perks offered, you can still be a huge help by sharing this Indiegogo page on your socials  ...and by following, liking and commenting on ours. Tell your friends & tell them to tell their friends – Help us spread the news.

Or do you have any skills you think might help us out at Hintonburger?

If you do, let us know - we love to collaborate.

In Closing...

As always, THANKS so much for all of your dedication and support.

When we reopen, we will continue to give back & support the community we love, while serving up delicious fresh, locally sourced, handmade food and having fun watching smiles on faces.

Now... Who's hungry??? Who wants a HINTONBURGER ?
story_txt:
Thanks to the team at Hudson Marlowe for the videowww.HudsonMarlowe.com
 
The quick story ...
Oh - How we’ve missed you!
It’s been just over two years since we closed our location at Bayswater, and even though we’ve seen a lot of our customers and neighbours at our various pop up events since then, we’ve missed actively being in, and contributing to the amazing community we love!
We’re really hoping to bring Hintonburger back home this spring for a season of great burgers, fries and a side of community.
But we really need your help
 

The longer story ...Who we are & how we've come to this point:

When we first opened up in our little shack in the neighbourhood, we were quite overwhelmed by the support and love that we received. It seemed as it was the desire of our friends and neighbours to help us succeed.
It was thanks to our neighbours and supporters, that we received numerous accolades including being voted ‘Ottawa’s BEST Burger’ many times ... a reputation that we are committed to uphold and we strive for with each and every burger we make. We’ve been featured in newspapers, online blogs, books, radio, social media, local and national TV – all because of YOU and your support. Seriously - You lined up for us, you endured long wait times and you came with us to a few location moves as we grew! Your unwavering love and support kept us going for all these years!!!
Hintonburger was always eager to return the favour. We fed thousands of meals at our monthly neighbourhood breakfasts, raised money for local charities, donated food to various groups, fundraisers and more. We hired and trained local folks with barriers to employment. From day one, community involvement has been a top commitment and reward for the burger business that bears this great neighbourhoods name.
We love being in, and contributing to Hintonburg!
So - What happened?
Let’s summarize the last couple years quickly, and get back to the feel-good excitement of the relaunch!
After out-growing the shack, we moved to our second location. It was great but as time went on we then outgrew that location. Our last move, although a larger location had a lot of issues, including several robberies. It really just didn’t have the same vibe, then we started noticing a dip in sales, and to be honest, all these issues compounded and we got depressed. We were given an offer for early termination of our lease and we accepted, took a few weeks to clear our heads and spotted another location. It was too good to be true and soon that location fell apart, so without an ideal location we would miss the busiest months of the year.
At that point, we decided to reorganize and put plans and focus into coming back fresh and revitalized in the spring of 2020. See where this is going? We finished final negotiations and secured a location on March 10th 2020. A few days later on March 13th, lockdown was announced, thus dashing those hopes of reopening. With the restrictions in place we parted ways |and watched with heavy hearts as our friends pivoted and adapted constantly through the year. We hit the drawing board, and decided that it was best to wait, again, for spring 2021.
Still we missed it ...missed you. Thanks to the help of some friends, we were happy and excited to present a series of well received pop-up events, but wanted to do more.
This brings us to here.


What we need... 

and what we’ll give YOU in return:
We have a solid plan which brings us back to the basics, or back to the shack style as it was, having a good time delivering great tasting, high quality, fresh handmade burgers using locally sourced ingredients and giving back to our community and supporters.
First of all - We have secured a new ‘home’ for Hintonburger
For now, we need to keep the location quiet until we meet our goal and can be sure we are able to relaunch as planned. What we can say is that while restrictions continue to be announced and changed and things seem uncertain, we have a great new location – one that will be able to adapt quickly to any restrictions that may happen or change to help ensure we can serve our delicious burgers no matter what.
We’ve also gathered and sourced great deals on most of the equipment and supplies we need to get up and running. A lot of time and funds have already been invested by the partners to help make this plan come to fruition.
We really need your support - Hintonburger needs to raise $6k to get going.
How will we use the funds raised here:

Kitchen equipment & installation (fryers, sinks, prep tables, fridges)
Licenses, fees & insurance
Kitchen Reno and decor
Initial food orders with our local suppliers and farmers

We’ve put together a fun set of rewards perks for our contributors.
Everything from stickers, shirts, burgers to some very limited and exclusive options.
Want to donate ... and you have a special reward in mind that we haven’t listed?We’re flexible, open for options and into collaboration – so drop us an email and let us know.

Other Ways You Can Help
Don’t forget that if you can’t contribute on this fundraising campaign or take advantage of the perks offered, you can still be a huge help by sharing this Indiegogo page on your socials  ...and by following, liking and commenting on ours. Tell your friends & tell them to tell their friends – Help us spread the news.
Or do you have any skills you think might help us out at Hintonburger?
If you do, let us know - we love to collaborate.

In Closing...
As always, THANKS so much for all of your dedication and support.
When we reopen, we will continue to give back & support the community we love, while serving up delicious fresh, locally sourced, handmade food and having fun watching smiles on faces.
Now... Who's hungry??? Who wants a HINTONBURGER ?

story:
You pull out your favorite dish, and as much as you enjoy it, there is something about it that is just the same as it's always been. We have all experienced this phenomenon at one time or another. Foods that usually seem delicious start to lose some of their attraction.

 

Here's the thing: in Russia, we've come up with a solution. It's called Russian Sauce, and it's going to change the way you think about every meal.

Created in Russia, Russian Sauce is a multi-layered sauce, each bite sure to bring out a different aspect of whatever you're eating. There are hints of peppers, tomatoes, garlic, carrots, and even apples, all combining for a uniquely tangy flavor profile. One moment it's spicy, and the next moment it's sweet. That's the wonder of Russian Sauce, a sauce so delicious we couldn't keep it inside Russia's borders.

Whatever your favorite foods are already, Russian Sauce will suit them perfectly. Pizza, chicken, steak, and even salad: all of these become even more satisfying when you pour some Russian Sauce on top of them. The flavors are so different and so diverse, there is no limit to the ways that you can enjoy them.

 

Are you on a diet? Are you trying to eat vegan?

 

We've got some wonderful news for you: Russian Sauce is not only vegan but also vegan and low in calories too. We have sourced all-natural ingredients for Russian Sauce, committing ourselves to your health, not only your taste satisfaction.

For hundreds of years, our family has passed down the recipe for Russian Sauce. Now, we want to bring it to your home. After your first taste, we are confident that you're never going to look back. Russian Sauce takes off immediately and lands smoothly.

 

Whichever flavor you choose – Mild, Medium, or Hot – you can count on a one-of-a-kind balance between sweet, sour, tangy, and spice. From there, it's all up to you. All you need to do at this point is decide how you are going to use it.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Right now, we are turning to you for help raising the funds that we need to expand the production of Russian Sauce. We successfully raised the requested amount of $10000 on Kickstater! We will begin bottling Russian Sauce and shipping very soon.  We have already obtained all of the licenses and permits that we need through the FDA, and once we hit our funding goal, we will be able to move forward with our expansion plans immediately.

Where we are in the process?

  • Registered LLC in Virginia
  • Purchased Insurance
  • Food Process operation has been approved by VDACS
  • Registered with FDA 
  • Nutrition Facts Panel approved
  • Achieved FDA required certifications: Acidified Foods Manufacturing, eFoodHander Safety, and Food Protection Manager certifications
  • Signed a contract with a local commercial kitchen
  • Passed Arlington County kitchen inspection
  • Finalize our label and design
  • Currently going through VDACS cooking inspection. (Final step before production) 

 

Our goals in the next 24 months.

  • Expand bottling capacities and production
  • Join local farmer markets 

 

FDA approved Label and Nutrition Facts

 

To say thanks to everyone who makes a contribution to this campaign, we are offering some exclusive rewards, including discounts on cases of Russian Sauce jars.

Contribute now and do your part to bring this piece of Russia to chefs and foodies worldwide!

 

One More Way to Help

 

In addition to making a monetary contribution to this campaign, you can show your support for Russian Sauce by sharing a link to the campaign page on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use.

We appreciate all your support, monetary and non-monetary alike. Thank you for your time.

Add-ons:

Testimonials

  • "What an amazing and unique taste. The combination of flavors is unparalleled. This sauce is the next thing big thing!" - Gary S.
  • "Russian sauce is amazing! You can use it in so many ways! Great for breakfast as a bread spread, for dinner as a sauce for meat, fish, or literally anything u eat! It is so very well balanced, flavorful, delicious! Will get it again for sure! Yummmm!"               - Anastasia M.
  • "For someone interested in an outside-the-box flavor profile, give this a try. I'm hooked!"- Shannon S.
  • It's made for a distinct and incredibly flavorful salsa! I had the Hot version. The sauce very much has a consistency that feels homemade which lends to its authenticity and it's a good heat too. It isn't hot for the sake of being hot and balances the heat with the sweet well. I highly recommend it. I specifically love the versatility, it can be used for cooking, as a dip, in a myriad of ways, and the end result will always be deliciousness." - Jamila S.
  • "I fell in love with the freshness and taste of this sauce at the very first bite! Its unique flavor and freshness is not like anything else I've tried. - Mary P.
  • "I am generally not a fan of spicy sauces but like a sauce with a hearty taste. The Russian Sauce that I sampled was very tasty with a bit of a "zing". It was both sweet and spicy at the same time. I highly recommend it!!!!" - John C.
  • "What a discovery! I pretty much used it with all kinds of meat over the weekend with friends - a great taste that actually compliments the food, a good balance of spices and texture. Love it." - Roman A.
  • "I use the Russian Sauce for dipping and marinades. It is great as a Marinade, especially when grilling Chicken and Pork chops. In addition, the Hot one has replaced my siracha as the go-to Hot Sauce. The medium one I use for Chips and Salsa, or on top of toast. This sauce is addictive, delicious, and most important it is healthy." - Erjon X.
  • "Absolutely love the sauce, and it actually can be eaten with just about anything. It's a "multi-everything" sauce!" - Monice Q.
  • "Love the sauce, definitely a fan of the Hot version. It goes great with all kinds of meat, fish, and eggs- or even with just a spoon. It's delicious! Oh great for Pizza as well." - Dorina J.

story:
The company, "La Colmena Del Lago," started  nearly 2 year ago when Jean-Baptiste (agricultural engineer and beekeeper for more than 15 years) invited Christophe, a friend from high school and university, to visit him in Guatemala. Jean-Baptiste’s idea was to discuss how to develop, improve, and standardize the mead he always produced as a hobby in order to obtain a unique and high quality product which can be enjoyed by itself, as a cocktail, or to pair with a meal.

After several months of testing, they finally found THE recipe using the honey harvested  from Jean-Baptiste's hives, located in the mountains around Lake Atitlan. During this time, they also began to develop a range of canned products from European cuisine, mainly for their own enjoyment. However, word got out about these products and they received a lot of demand for tasting and buying. From this, they realized a great future and decided to create their company, "La Colmena Del Lago."

While developing the company, Jean-Baptiste and Christophe called on one of their friends, me (David), to join them and help with the distribution- thanks to his experience as a sales representative for one of the most famous Belgian distribution companies of international drinks.

 

What is Mead ?

Mead is a fermented beverage mainly made of water, honey, and yeast. In other words, it is a wine made with honey instead of traditional wine grapes.

Mead also give you the opportunity to develop a huge diversity of flavors by mixing it with fruits, herbs, or spices. 

Although it is the oldest alcoholic beverage in the world (we can find traces of this drink dating back to more than 7,000 years BC), mead has been a bit forgotten with the higher preference for beer and wine. HOWEVER, over the past years, the rise of mead has returned and has been covered by several newspapers such as The Guardian, The Wall Street Journal, The New York Times, NPR, and Forbes.

https://www.theguardian.com/travel/2015/may/17/...
http://www.wsj.com/articles/meads-of-the-moment...
http://www.nytimes.com/2015/11/15/nyregion/mead...
http://www.nytimes.com/2016/08/16/t-magazine/fo...
http://www.forbes.com/pictures/ehlk45lii/mead/#...
http://www.npr.org/sections/thesalt/2016/08/04/...
http://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2016-08-...  

 

What Makes Our Mead Unique?

First of all, so far there are no branded mead producers in Guatemala.

Secondly, the honey we use to produce our mead is harvested either by Jean-Baptiste himself, who is a certified beekeeper, or by other trusted local producers that Jean-Baptiste has visited and carefully selected. Jean-Baptiste always ensures the quality of the honey and only the one approved by him is used. 

Thirdly, the mead is a gluten free product, which is a characteristic increasingly desired by consumers.

Fourthly, most of the meads produced abroad are still (non-sparkling). However, our mead is dry and sparkling, so it's perfect for pairing with a meal or to be enjoyed by itself as an alternative to beer, wine, cider, or even champagne.

Moreover, we will also only be using ingredients from local suppliers. Therefore, you’re not only helping us, but the local economy as well.

 

What We Need:

These Indiegogo funds will go towards bringing our mead to the market. As you probably know, this process requires a professional kitchen and several permits and licences that include an environmental study of the impact of the production and a sanitary licence.

So far, the three of us have invested a lot of private funds and all our time to:

  • Purchase all the equipment to produce the mead 
  • Purchase all the material to commercialize it (bottles, corks, labels, etc…)
  • Rent a space to stock equipment and material

 

We are aiming to collect $18,000 or more for this campaign that we will use as detailed in the graph below :

 

Itemized Breakdown:
 

LICENSING (= $2,500) : To be able to commercialize our mead, we need several permits and licences such as an environmental study of the impact of the production, a sanitary license, a permit to sell alcohol, an analysis of our products, etc...

CONSTRUCTION (= $7,200) : The building that we have been renting for our product making and storage no longer meets our growing need for more space. For this, it is necessary for us to construct a new space devoted solely to production, while the old building will be used for stock and storage.

RENOVATION (= $2,500) : We will need to do some home improvement work in our storage space such as: a suspended ceiling, clog leaks, repaint, install a new floor …

EQUIPMENT : (= $4,400) : Stainless steel worktop, biodigester, industrial stainless steel washbasin, water tank, water filter, water heater, more shelves, and more fermentation tanks /barrels

TRADEMARK REGISTRATION : (= $1,000) : $120 for a preliminary analysis + $880 for registration

CREATION OF A WEBSITE: (= $400)

Any additional money raised will be used to buy a small piece of land where we could install more beehives and therefore be sure we can ensure the production of the mead using our high quality and organic honey supervised by Jean-Baptiste.

Extra money can also give us the opportunity to hire a full time person in the village to assist us for the production and the distribution.

 

What Do You Get for Supporting Us?

Your support is vital for us and for the success of this project.

Therefore we wanted to offer different perks so that all of you, regardless of your participation, can receive a little something to thank you (see the rewards from the list on the right)  !!

 

The Perks:

Option 1 : Free Donation
To do so, you can simply click on the "Back It" red button on the right of the video (or "Soutenez ce projet" in French - "Respaldar" in Spanish) and choose the amount of your help.



 

Option 2 : High Five ($5) 
Receive our infinite gratitude for helping support young entrepreneurs like us! We will keep you up to date on the developments and progress of our project and we will mention your generosity to all of our followers on Facebook and on our website.

Option 3 : Double High Five ($10) 
We give you twice our infinite gratitude and thanks !!
We will keep you up to date on the developments and progress of our project and we will mention your generosity to all of our followers on Facebook and on our website.

Option 4 : A 6 pack of StrongBee ($20)
Enjoy a 6-pack of StrongBee delivered at home + receive our infinite gratitude + a mention of your generosity to all of our followers on Facebook and on our website (See FAQ's).

Option 5 : Carved Coconut Necklace or Wristband ($25)
Choose between a necklace made out of a coconut shell that will make you stand out in a crowd or a unique bracelet in macrame + receive our infinite gratitude + a mention of your generosity to all of our followers on Facebook and on our website.

* Because of the nature of the product (coconut shell), the final product you'll receive might be different. Indeed, each piece is unique and hand made by a local craftsman.

Option 6 : I Want This Cap ($30)
Receive a branded cap with "StrongBee" + our infinite gratitude + a mention of your generosity to all of our followers on Facebook and on our website.


* Picture may differ from actual product

Option 7 : Sponsor One of Our Beehives ($30)​
Sponsor one of our beehives by naming it and following the "life" of your bees (send us an email at lacolmenadellago@gmail.com) + receive our infinite gratitude + a mention of your generosity to all of our followers on Facebook and on our website.
We already speak about our apiary at:  http://revistaviatori.com/viajes/la-colmena-san...

Option 8 : Sponsor 2 Children for an Introduction to Beekeeping ($40)
Thanks to you, two children from "Escuela Caracol," a Waldorf kindergarden and primary school located in San Marcos L.L.  will follow an introductory course of beekeeping. They will learn more about the bees through a theoretical and practical class. (We will invite children from other local schools to join if this perk is a success!) :)
You will also receive photos / videos of these children during their beekeeping lessons :)


* Children from the "Caracol" School

Option 9 : Official Branded T-shirt ($45)
Receive a branded T-shirt with "StrongBee" + our infinite gratitude + a mention of your generosity to all of our followers on Facebook and on our website.


* Womens and mens "branded" T-shirt

Option 10 : "Guatemalan Meadery" T-shirt ($45)
Receive our "Guatemalan Meadery" t-shirt + our infinite gratitude + a mention of your generosity to all of our followers on Facebook and on our website


* Womens and mens "Guatemalan Meadery" T-shirt

Option 11 : "The Way of Mead" T-shirt ($45)
Receive our "The way of Mead" T-shirt + our infinite gratitude + a mention of your generosity to all of our followers on Facebook and on our website.


* Mens "The Way of Mead" T-shirt

* Womens "The Way of Mead" T-shirt (Also available in grey)

Option 12 : Join us for a 4-Hour Beekeeping Course ($50)
Join us for a 4 hour course on beekeeping with Jean-Baptiste in San Marcos La Laguna + receive our infinite gratitude  + a mention of your generosity to all of our followers on Facebook and on our website.

Option 13 : A Crate of StrongBee ($60)
Save 25%  (Retail Price : $80) and enjoy a crate (24 bottles) of StrongBee delivered to your home + receive our infinite gratitude + a mention of your generosity to all of our followers on Facebook and on our website (See FAQ's).

Option 14 : Combo ($80)
You like what we do and what to help more?!
Have the combo : (cap, official branded T-shirt - necklace/wristband and save 20%) and represent StrongBee in any situation !


Option 15 : Get Together ($100)
Come and stay with us for 2 nights at our place in San Marcos La Laguna (For to 2 pers).
Enjoy your time here to discover one of the prettiest of the lakeside villages and its melange of cultures. You will be our guests and enjoy some StrongBee and taste our European canned products.


* view from the house on the lake Atitlan

Option 16 : Super Early Bird Lifetime Supply of StrongBee ($400)
You will receive EVERY YEAR (for your birthday) a 6-pack of our delicious StrongBee delivered to your home + receive our infinite gratitude  + a mention of your generosity to all of our followers on Facebook and on our website (See FAQ's)

Option 17 : Early Bird - Lifetime Supply ($450)
You will receive EVERY YEAR (for your birthday) a 6-pack of our delicious StrongBee delivered to your home + receive our infinite gratitude + a mention of your generosity to all of our followers on Facebook and on our website (See FAQ's).
 

Option 18 : StrongBee Crate Lifetime Supply ($1,150)
You will receive EVERY YEAR (for your birthday) a crate (24 bottles) of our delicious StrongBee delivered to your home + receive our infinite gratitude + a mention of your generosity to all of our followers on Facebook and on our website (See FAQ's).

 

Other Ways You Can Help :

Can't offer a donation? No problem, you can also help us by:

  • Spreading the word  by sharing our page or video. Publicity and visibility is really helpful.
  • Liking our Facebook page (www.facebook.com/lacomenadellago) and invite your network to do the same.

 

If we don't reach our goal...

In the case that we don't raise all the money we need, we will still continue to move forward in the procedures and building required. Only, we will need to find other means of funding to reach our goal as quickly as possible. The realization of this project will come true in one way or another. It all just depends on the amount and quickness of the help we gratefully receive.

Opportunities for the Company

This whole process will take approximqtely one year and a lot of work before our mead can be available commercially because we will be dependent on various factors (like period of time before obtaining licences, time to build our new facility, etc...).

On the other hand, we are located in a very interesting and fortunate place that offers a lot of opportunity for products such as ours.  Along with the vibrant and varied nightlife, San Marcos La Laguna and the surrounding areas of the lake, attract many kinds of "alternative“ and “New Age" clientele- both of whom are looking for new experiences. And that is exactly what our product is!

 

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS (FAQ'S)

How old must I be to purchase StrongBee?

You must be of legal drinking age (18 or 21 years depending the legislation in your country) at the time of purchase. Sorry for that, but that is the law.

Can I buy StrongBee now if I’m not of legal drinking age today but will be before delivery?

Again, you must be of legal drinking age AT THE TIME OF PURCHASE.

Can I buy StrongBee now if I’m not of legal drinking age​ but I am giving it as a gift to someone who is?

It is very generous of you, and it's all to your credit. But once again, No.

How does it work?

        At the end of the campaign, you will receive a voucher for your StrongBee perks.

Why do we send vouchers?

We are not allowed to directly offer alcoholic beverages to our backers. But we can offer a voucher that allows a physical delivery or in-store pickup of the alcoholic beverage.
story_txt:
The company, "La Colmena Del Lago," started  nearly 2 year ago when Jean-Baptiste (agricultural engineer and beekeeper for more than 15 years) invited Christophe, a friend from high school and university, to visit him in Guatemala. Jean-Baptiste’s idea was to discuss how to develop, improve, and standardize the mead he always produced as a hobby in order to obtain a unique and high quality product which can be enjoyed by itself, as a cocktail, or to pair with a meal.After several months of testing, they finally found THE recipe using the honey harvested  from Jean-Baptiste's hives, located in the mountains around Lake Atitlan. During this time, they also began to develop a range of canned products from European cuisine, mainly for their own enjoyment. However, word got out about these products and they received a lot of demand for tasting and buying. From this, they realized a great future and decided to create their company, "La Colmena Del Lago."While developing the company, Jean-Baptiste and Christophe called on one of their friends, me (David), to join them and help with the distribution- thanks to his experience as a sales representative for one of the most famous Belgian distribution companies of international drinks. What is Mead ?Mead is a fermented beverage mainly made of water, honey, and yeast. In other words, it is a wine made with honey instead of traditional wine grapes.Mead also give you the opportunity to develop a huge diversity of flavors by mixing it with fruits, herbs, or spices. Although it is the oldest alcoholic beverage in the world (we can find traces of this drink dating back to more than 7,000 years BC), mead has been a bit forgotten with the higher preference for beer and wine. HOWEVER, over the past years, the rise of mead has returned and has been covered by several newspapers such as The Guardian, The Wall Street Journal, The New York Times, NPR, and Forbes.https://www.theguardian.com/travel/2015/may/17/...http://www.wsj.com/articles/meads-of-the-moment...http://www.nytimes.com/2015/11/15/nyregion/mead...http://www.nytimes.com/2016/08/16/t-magazine/fo...http://www.forbes.com/pictures/ehlk45lii/mead/#...http://www.npr.org/sections/thesalt/2016/08/04/...http://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2016-08-...   What Makes Our Mead Unique?First of all, so far there are no branded mead producers in Guatemala.Secondly, the honey we use to produce our mead is harvested either by Jean-Baptiste himself, who is a certified beekeeper, or by other trusted local producers that Jean-Baptiste has visited and carefully selected. Jean-Baptiste always ensures the quality of the honey and only the one approved by him is used. Thirdly, the mead is a gluten free product, which is a characteristic increasingly desired by consumers.Fourthly, most of the meads produced abroad are still (non-sparkling). However, our mead is dry and sparkling, so it's perfect for pairing with a meal or to be enjoyed by itself as an alternative to beer, wine, cider, or even champagne.Moreover, we will also only be using ingredients from local suppliers. Therefore, you’re not only helping us, but the local economy as well. What We Need:These Indiegogo funds will go towards bringing our mead to the market. As you probably know, this process requires a professional kitchen and several permits and licences that include an environmental study of the impact of the production and a sanitary licence.So far, the three of us have invested a lot of private funds and all our time to:
Purchase all the equipment to produce the mead 
Purchase all the material to commercialize it (bottles, corks, labels, etc…)
Rent a space to stock equipment and material
 We are aiming to collect $18,000 or more for this campaign that we will use as detailed in the graph below : Itemized Breakdown: LICENSING (= $2,500) : To be able to commercialize our mead, we need several permits and licences such as an environmental study of the impact of the production, a sanitary license, a permit to sell alcohol, an analysis of our products, etc...CONSTRUCTION (= $7,200) : The building that we have been renting for our product making and storage no longer meets our growing need for more space. For this, it is necessary for us to construct a new space devoted solely to production, while the old building will be used for stock and storage.RENOVATION (= $2,500) : We will need to do some home improvement work in our storage space such as: a suspended ceiling, clog leaks, repaint, install a new floor …EQUIPMENT : (= $4,400) : Stainless steel worktop, biodigester, industrial stainless steel washbasin, water tank, water filter, water heater, more shelves, and more fermentation tanks /barrelsTRADEMARK REGISTRATION : (= $1,000) : $120 for a preliminary analysis + $880 for registrationCREATION OF A WEBSITE: (= $400)Any additional money raised will be used to buy a small piece of land where we could install more beehives and therefore be sure we can ensure the production of the mead using our high quality and organic honey supervised by Jean-Baptiste.Extra money can also give us the opportunity to hire a full time person in the village to assist us for the production and the distribution. What Do You Get for Supporting Us?Your support is vital for us and for the success of this project.Therefore we wanted to offer different perks so that all of you, regardless of your participation, can receive a little something to thank you (see the rewards from the list on the right)  !! The Perks:Option 1 : Free DonationTo do so, you can simply click on the "Back It" red button on the right of the video (or "Soutenez ce projet" in French - "Respaldar" in Spanish) and choose the amount of your help. Option 2 : High Five ($5) Receive our infinite gratitude for helping support young entrepreneurs like us! We will keep you up to date on the developments and progress of our project and we will mention your generosity to all of our followers on Facebook and on our website.Option 3 : Double High Five ($10) We give you twice our infinite gratitude and thanks !!We will keep you up to date on the developments and progress of our project and we will mention your generosity to all of our followers on Facebook and on our website.Option 4 : A 6 pack of StrongBee ($20)Enjoy a 6-pack of StrongBee delivered at home + receive our infinite gratitude + a mention of your generosity to all of our followers on Facebook and on our website (See FAQ's).Option 5 : Carved Coconut Necklace or Wristband ($25)Choose between a necklace made out of a coconut shell that will make you stand out in a crowd or a unique bracelet in macrame + receive our infinite gratitude + a mention of your generosity to all of our followers on Facebook and on our website.* Because of the nature of the product (coconut shell), the final product you'll receive might be different. Indeed, each piece is unique and hand made by a local craftsman.Option 6 : I Want This Cap ($30)Receive a branded cap with "StrongBee" + our infinite gratitude + a mention of your generosity to all of our followers on Facebook and on our website.* Picture may differ from actual productOption 7 : Sponsor One of Our Beehives ($30)​Sponsor one of our beehives by naming it and following the "life" of your bees (send us an email at lacolmenadellago@gmail.com) + receive our infinite gratitude + a mention of your generosity to all of our followers on Facebook and on our website.We already speak about our apiary at:  http://revistaviatori.com/viajes/la-colmena-san...Option 8 : Sponsor 2 Children for an Introduction to Beekeeping ($40)Thanks to you, two children from "Escuela Caracol," a Waldorf kindergarden and primary school located in San Marcos L.L.  will follow an introductory course of beekeeping. They will learn more about the bees through a theoretical and practical class. (We will invite children from other local schools to join if this perk is a success!) :)You will also receive photos / videos of these children during their beekeeping lessons :)* Children from the "Caracol" SchoolOption 9 : Official Branded T-shirt ($45)Receive a branded T-shirt with "StrongBee" + our infinite gratitude + a mention of your generosity to all of our followers on Facebook and on our website.* Womens and mens "branded" T-shirtOption 10 : "Guatemalan Meadery" T-shirt ($45)Receive our "Guatemalan Meadery" t-shirt + our infinite gratitude + a mention of your generosity to all of our followers on Facebook and on our website* Womens and mens "Guatemalan Meadery" T-shirtOption 11 : "The Way of Mead" T-shirt ($45)Receive our "The way of Mead" T-shirt + our infinite gratitude + a mention of your generosity to all of our followers on Facebook and on our website.* Mens "The Way of Mead" T-shirt* Womens "The Way of Mead" T-shirt (Also available in grey)Option 12 : Join us for a 4-Hour Beekeeping Course ($50)Join us for a 4 hour course on beekeeping with Jean-Baptiste in San Marcos La Laguna + receive our infinite gratitude  + a mention of your generosity to all of our followers on Facebook and on our website.Option 13 : A Crate of StrongBee ($60)Save 25%  (Retail Price : $80) and enjoy a crate (24 bottles) of StrongBee delivered to your home + receive our infinite gratitude + a mention of your generosity to all of our followers on Facebook and on our website (See FAQ's).Option 14 : Combo ($80) You like what we do and what to help more?!Have the combo : (cap, official branded T-shirt - necklace/wristband and save 20%) and represent StrongBee in any situation !Option 15 : Get Together ($100) Come and stay with us for 2 nights at our place in San Marcos La Laguna (For to 2 pers).Enjoy your time here to discover one of the prettiest of the lakeside villages and its melange of cultures. You will be our guests and enjoy some StrongBee and taste our European canned products.* view from the house on the lake AtitlanOption 16 : Super Early Bird Lifetime Supply of StrongBee ($400)You will receive EVERY YEAR (for your birthday) a 6-pack of our delicious StrongBee delivered to your home + receive our infinite gratitude  + a mention of your generosity to all of our followers on Facebook and on our website (See FAQ's)Option 17 : Early Bird - Lifetime Supply ($450)You will receive EVERY YEAR (for your birthday) a 6-pack of our delicious StrongBee delivered to your home + receive our infinite gratitude + a mention of your generosity to all of our followers on Facebook and on our website (See FAQ's). Option 18 : StrongBee Crate Lifetime Supply ($1,150)You will receive EVERY YEAR (for your birthday) a crate (24 bottles) of our delicious StrongBee delivered to your home + receive our infinite gratitude + a mention of your generosity to all of our followers on Facebook and on our website (See FAQ's). Other Ways You Can Help :Can't offer a donation? No problem, you can also help us by:
Spreading the word  by sharing our page or video. Publicity and visibility is really helpful.
Liking our Facebook page (www.facebook.com/lacomenadellago) and invite your network to do the same.
 If we don't reach our goal...In the case that we don't raise all the money we need, we will still continue to move forward in the procedures and building required. Only, we will need to find other means of funding to reach our goal as quickly as possible. The realization of this project will come true in one way or another. It all just depends on the amount and quickness of the help we gratefully receive.Opportunities for the CompanyThis whole process will take approximqtely one year and a lot of work before our mead can be available commercially because we will be dependent on various factors (like period of time before obtaining licences, time to build our new facility, etc...).On the other hand, we are located in a very interesting and fortunate place that offers a lot of opportunity for products such as ours.  Along with the vibrant and varied nightlife, San Marcos La Laguna and the surrounding areas of the lake, attract many kinds of "alternative“ and “New Age" clientele- both of whom are looking for new experiences. And that is exactly what our product is! FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS (FAQ'S)How old must I be to purchase StrongBee?You must be of legal drinking age (18 or 21 years depending the legislation in your country) at the time of purchase. Sorry for that, but that is the law.Can I buy StrongBee now if I’m not of legal drinking age today but will be before delivery?Again, you must be of legal drinking age AT THE TIME OF PURCHASE.Can I buy StrongBee now if I’m not of legal drinking age​ but I am giving it as a gift to someone who is?It is very generous of you, and it's all to your credit. But once again, No.How does it work?        At the end of the campaign, you will receive a voucher for your StrongBee perks.Why do we send vouchers?We are not allowed to directly offer alcoholic beverages to our backers. But we can offer a voucher that allows a physical delivery or in-store pickup of the alcoholic beverage.

story:
Food Pedaler is a hyper-local restaurant delivery service, bringing you food from your favorite restaurants, on bikes. We started in St Louis' Central West End in early 2013 from absolute scratch. Our friends and neighbors received us enthusiastically and warmly, and have kept us rolling and thriving. Thank you so much, we have been very blessed!

The neighborhood-based model we've built from the rider up is how we have made and maintained such awesome relationships, and why our service is so remarkable. However, our unique way of dispatching also means there are not ready-made tools to help us grow this special way of doing business.

We have been building software ourselves for two years! As it turns out, finishing up will cost us more money than we have. So we are turning to our current and new fans for help! This is a great way to show your love, help the local guys out, and get awesome stuff for your investment.

$12,000 will allow us to roll out the tools we need right now to grow and serve you better. Anything beyond this goal, and we have a long list of features and services we will add.

We are not able to add all the neighborhoods we want to while continuing to provide this amazing  service without the resources to complete this project, and all of your support is immensely appreciated.

What is more important than money from this campaign is that you continue choosing us to bring you the best food in the neighborhood when you can't get out or want to stay in, and you share us with your friends! 

We remain the only local restaurant delivery service in St Louis, and you make this dream of ours a reality every day because you pick us and spread the good word. THANK YOU SO MUCH!

For your support, we have some amazing prizes including all kinds of great schwag, a party, a chance to get in on one of our first subscription options, and... unlimited delivery for life! Our goal at Food Pedaler has always been to be the greatest food delivery service on the planet, and with your help, the ride will continue.

story:
Our Story (In Short)

Hey, everybody, my name is Joey and I was inspired to make this amazing hot sauce for the love of my life, Lisa! We are committed to taking care of our bodies and our health - so when Lisa said one day that she wished they didn't put SUGAR in all the hot sauces out there I got to work! I went to the Farmer's Market in Mar Vista, CA the next day and found a woman who grows organic hot peppers - crazy ones! I came home and used the Italian cooking skills my 90-year-old Calabrian mother passed down to me over the years to make a hot sauce for Lisa.

Roasting and keeping true to the integrity and quality to create a hot sauce for her using the finest ingredients. It came out awesome! She loved it! The next day I was bragging about it to a colleague at work and he wanted in. Starting this whole journey into becoming an artisanal hot sauce maker!

Being healthy is complex. There is no one approach or quick fix. We all need to take responsibility for what we are putting into our bodies, the company that we keep in our life, exercise that we do and reading labels that are marketed as being "healthy" because all too often they are not. So I was inspired to make a product that people can trust. 

That is why Joey's Hot Sauce is important to me. I love making a healthy option for people and seeing everyone's excitement about how good it tastes is so rewarding. In less than a year I have created over 2,000 bottles of this special hot sauce for friends and family. I have received RAVE reviews and it gives me incredible joy!

 

 

I am at a crossroads though, more and more people want Joey's Hot Sauce and I want to make it available to them. However in order to sell at Farmer's Markets, online, and in stores, there are some major steps we need to take - and we need your help!!

Here are a few things we need to do:

- Lease space in a commercial kitchen for production

- Get the certifications and licenses needed to sell 

- Get lab tests

- Invest in large quantities of bottles/orifice reducers and labels

- Get a webstore up and running

- Market the crap out of Joey's Hot Sauce!

If you help us make this happen it would mean everything to me AND it would mean I can keep producing the hot sauce that you know and love! I don't want to have to stop!

 

Before we keep going I want to thank some very special people who have helped me tremendously so far! Special thanks my incredible wife Lisa Paris, Shana Kuhn-Siegel, Grace and International Scherick, Nick Ross, Tim Savage, Bryan Callen, Frank Grillo, Rachel Rissoto, Jason Silva,  Elijah Hurtem, Curtis Barrel Savage, Mishka Bier & Christian, Antony Zito, Esteban, Courtney Klein, my mom Maria Repicé and my amazing family for all the support and love! 

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need to raise $40,000 to take Joey's Hot Sauce to the next level. This money is going to get us into a commercial kitchen, get all of the certifications we need in order to sell our hot sauce at Farmer's Markets, online in our new Joey's Hot Sauce online store and in select stores. We are planning to produce over 1440 bottles per month and we need to invest in pallets of bottles to bring the cost down so we can keep the business profitable and continue to produce the best hot sauce on the planet. Once we are in the commercial kitchen we need a marketing budget in order to promote our sauce online so that we can get Joey's Hot Sauce into EVERYBODY'S fridge - and we need YOU in order to help make that happen!  

 

PERKS!!!!!!

  • We are offering a ton of awesome perks like a Joey's Hot Sauce pin, t-shirt, a year supply of Joeys - you could even get your face on the bottle with a thank you from us, have Joey give you private healthy cooking lessons over videos conference OR have Joey cook an amazing dinner for you in your home for up to six people! 

 

  • Even if we don't reach our entire goal we will make progress in moving forward with the money we earn from this campaign. We are determined, and while we might have to move a little slower than we want to, the amount of money we raise here will be put to good use in our quest to get Joeys into everybody's fridge! 

 

 

The Impact Joey's Hot Sauce Makes

  • Cancer and obesity rates are on the rise and our food industry is not well. Everyone has to be the CEO of their own health. The public is looking for healthier choices and unfortunately, the food industry is masking themselves as healthy products (aka "natural") but you really have to do your research to know if what you are getting is good for you! Luckily, Joey's Hot Sauce is something you can rely on - we use fresh organic ingredients and do not use any sweeteners, binders or fillers.  

 

  • We started small making this out of our kitchen and have produced over 2,000 bottles for friends and family and friends of friends over the last year - and people are crazy about it. Joey has worked in the food industry for over 20 years, in particular in the health food arena with several renowned chefs including Neal Harden of Jean George and restaurants such as Pure Food & Wine and Plant Food & Wine. Lisa has been in the social media business for over ten years - executing numerous campaigns for brands big and small. 

 

Risks & Challenges

  • The competition is fierce and there are a lot of small-batch hot sauce companies out there but now one brings the GOURMET HEAT like Joeys- blending heirloom peppers, using the finest ingredients and his Calabrian mother's cooking sensibilities to deliver the most rich-in-flavor hot sauce with the depth of heat but also adaptable to pair with almost any dish. 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially please help spread the word!:

  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word on your socials.
  • Follow us on INSTAGRAM: @joeyshotsauce
  • Share Lisa and my passion for healthy, delicious food with everyone you know -  tell them about our campaign! Make a video like this:

story:
We are a farm based sustainable brewery!

 We have made our brewery and taproom become a reality and produce kick ass beers in it. We even licensed a farm, ya that's right, a farm. But we want to take it up a notch and create a bigger and better space for you to enjoy this amazing beer in. And this is where you come in.....

Here's what we'll do

 1- Make the best licensed picnic area and beer garden in Ontario!

We have a lot of outdoor space, I mean a lot, complete with fruit trees, barley fields, hop yards, concrete pads and animals (cows and goats and such!) While this space has worked for drinking beer we think it could be better (ie. more shade, parking, landscape, fences etc. to enable summer concerts, bocce ball, rolle bolle and horseshoe tournaments as well as festivals and food trucks), but we need your help to make "fun in the sun" a reality.

 2- Upgrade our taproom.

We have a pretty sweet little tap room that works as a great place to sit and chat over a beer with friends, but we have plans to make it bigger and better so many more can enjoy the experience year round.

 3- What did you say...? More swag??

We get tonnes of ideas from our fans for great swag and we want to make it happen for everyone. With your help we will create  some awesome t-shirts, hats, glasses, bags, totes, sweaters...possibilities are endless, ideas are plenty..money not as much!

 4- The whole point is to enjoy our beer!

We want our beer in your local bars and stores so that you can enjoy our beers no matter where you are, but in order to do this we need to increase our keg count and can production.

MORE BEER=MORE PACKAGING=MORE MONEY!

Winter 2018

 We opened our doors as a small farm based sustainable brewery with a five year plan of growing our own ingredients, keeping water use to a minimum and creating less waste than your average brewery. In under a year we had accomplished this and could not keep up with demand so we expanded our production capabilities by ten times. This expansion was completed by September 2019 and we are now ready to run with it! We aim to continue our proven practices and make it extra enjoyable for our visitors. We are confident in our vision for the future and continue to meet every aspect of this project with hard work and knowledge of our craft.

 We are looking to raise 30k to do these next smaller improvements and are going to give away many different experiences, swag, and love to the people that help out.  No matter if it's beer and a t-shirt, a weekend in beautiful Bayfield sampling our newest brews,  maybe you have a recipe for beer you have been dying to see made or a style in mind that you would like us to try, our goal is to give back in our favourite way possible...Beer!! Spread the word.....spread the love....send us a hug!! Every little bit contributes to turning our dreams into reality.
story_txt: We are a farm based sustainable brewery! We have made our brewery and taproom become a reality and produce kick ass beers in it. We even licensed a farm, ya that's right, a farm. But we want to take it up a notch and create a bigger and better space for you to enjoy this amazing beer in. And this is where you come in.....Here's what we'll do 1- Make the best licensed picnic area and beer garden in Ontario! We have a lot of outdoor space, I mean a lot, complete with fruit trees, barley fields, hop yards, concrete pads and animals (cows and goats and such!) While this space has worked for drinking beer we think it could be better (ie. more shade, parking, landscape, fences etc. to enable summer concerts, bocce ball, rolle bolle and horseshoe tournaments as well as festivals and food trucks), but we need your help to make "fun in the sun" a reality. 2- Upgrade our taproom.We have a pretty sweet little tap room that works as a great place to sit and chat over a beer with friends, but we have plans to make it bigger and better so many more can enjoy the experience year round. 3- What did you say...? More swag??We get tonnes of ideas from our fans for great swag and we want to make it happen for everyone. With your help we will create  some awesome t-shirts, hats, glasses, bags, totes, sweaters...possibilities are endless, ideas are plenty..money not as much! 4- The whole point is to enjoy our beer!We want our beer in your local bars and stores so that you can enjoy our beers no matter where you are, but in order to do this we need to increase our keg count and can production.MORE BEER=MORE PACKAGING=MORE MONEY!Winter 2018 We opened our doors as a small farm based sustainable brewery with a five year plan of growing our own ingredients, keeping water use to a minimum and creating less waste than your average brewery. In under a year we had accomplished this and could not keep up with demand so we expanded our production capabilities by ten times. This expansion was completed by September 2019 and we are now ready to run with it! We aim to continue our proven practices and make it extra enjoyable for our visitors. We are confident in our vision for the future and continue to meet every aspect of this project with hard work and knowledge of our craft. We are looking to raise 30k to do these next smaller improvements and are going to give away many different experiences, swag, and love to the people that help out.  No matter if it's beer and a t-shirt, a weekend in beautiful Bayfield sampling our newest brews,  maybe you have a recipe for beer you have been dying to see made or a style in mind that you would like us to try, our goal is to give back in our favourite way possible...Beer!! Spread the word.....spread the love....send us a hug!! Every little bit contributes to turning our dreams into reality.

story:
WE ARE PAXX SUPPLEMENTS

Paxx Supplements has created dissolvable, pre-portioned sports supplement packets, designed for on-the-go convenience. Our whey protein blend is packed full of 24 grams of protein with only 120 calories! Paxx has successfully created the easiest way to consume sports supplements! Created by a team of avid fitness enthusiasts, it is our goal to provide a more efficient way to consume and transport your supplements! 

                         

WHY DONATE?

Our goal is to raise $25,000. Your donations will be used to aid in the manufacturing and distribution of Paxx Supplements. With your help, we can deliver Paxx Supplements to doors across the United States.

The donations will be allocated into several areas to effectively produce our products.

These divisions include:

  • Manufacturing, using high quality industry manufacturing methods.
  • Product packaging and order fulfillment. 
  • Marketing development to create awareness for our amazing product.
  • Research and development for new products. 

The Impact

Our products are sold online and shipped directly to your door. We've eliminated the hassle of going to a supplement store, overpaying for bulky containers, and pesky powder spills! Paxx provides a quick and easy solution. Simply, "Drop. Shake. Drink."

Other Ways You Can Help

Help us increase product awareness by sharing with friends and family! Also, like and share us on social media by using the Indiegogo share tools!

Our Blend

                                                       

 

Environmental Initiative 

Our products are environmentally friendly. By using our 100% recycled product packaging as the shipping box, we are able to cut the amount of waste in half! Our encasing material dissolves into the beverage which eliminates the need for single serving packets! We understand the importance of a greener world and we want to make as big of an impact as we can!  

                                                   

 

The Team 

                      

Timeline

                     

Online Convenience

Online shopping, re-order convenience, and two-day shipping make purchasing supplements easier than ever! 

                               

 

Reviews 

                           

 

                       

 

                                

 

                                  

 

FAQ's

Q: Do you only carry protein supplements?

A: No, we are currently developing; pre-workout sports supplement pouch blends, post workout supplement pouch blends, BCAA blends, creatine blends, and vegaterian blends!

___________

Q: Is the encasing material safe for daily consumption?

A; Yes! The material has been used in different food applications for years.

___________

Q: If the goal is not met, will we receive our pre-orders?

A: Yes! All pre-orders will be delivered by December of this year (expected)

___________

Q: What if I can't donate?

A: Do not worry! Like and share us on social media to help spread the word! Your support is greatly appreciated!

___________

Q: Does the product contain dairy?

A: Yes, Paxx protein blends are whey protein based and contain dairy ingredients. Please refer to the Supplement Facts label for more information regarding allergens. 

 

For more information visit www.paxxsupplements.com
