May, 2017, with our pre-launch party May 26th.
 
Please take a look at the perks we have put together for you. There are some sweet rewards! Some of the perks include an invitation to our pre-launch party, which will be on our property, at Free Spirits Farm, where you might have a chance to say hello to Bambi & Roxy!
From the bottom of our hearts,
we thank you for your support!
xoxo

story:
The Little Urban Story

    We are Chad Urban and Bobby Little, we have a combined experience of 20 years working in the restaurant industry. Bob grew up working in deli’s & steakhouses in Kentucky. Chef Bob took this love for the hospitality industry, went to culinary school and found his way into the Michelin Star kitchens of California and New York. Chef Chad, grew up bouncing around the Midwest, finally landing on Cape Cod, MA. He grew up working in his dads factory & doing odd jobs from construction to dishwashing on a military base. He learned to enjoy hard work and working with his hands, following in his dads footsteps to open his own business he enrolled in the Culinary Institute of America. After school he moved to Manhattan and began working in Michelin star kitchens.

    This campaign is to help us create a collaborative restaurant that is based on our personal experiences growing up and cooking in professional kitchens. It has been our dream to create a restaurant and own our own business since we met. It is our goal to build an environment that is positive, fun and that benefits our employees. After working for years in kitchens and restaurants across the city and country. It is easy to see that employees are not always the most appreciated. We want to change that, we want to give our employees insurance, higher wages, benefits, paid time off & educational trips. We want to give back to the community with monthly charity dinners, that benefit a local or national cause. With this restaurant it is not only our vision to create a successful business, but to give back. 

    The magnitude of your support, is beyond words. We could never fully express how much your contribution would mean to us. Because that support would make our dreams come true. 

Fundraising Goal

Our goal is to get $50,000 to get the keys for a beautiful restaurant space in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, NY. Starting a restaurant is not cheap, making the dining room come to life will take some elbow grease, time and materials. Equipment is another story, our top priority is to invest in equipment that is durable. We do not need the fanciest tools on the market, but we need the most reliable. To execute the type of cuisine we want to serve, we will need an array of ovens for baking, roasting and braising, a grill to bring freshness and depth to our vegetables and a workhorse of a stove that will keep the kitchen running hot and smooth. Gathering small tools will be essential as well spatulas to flip some sizzling meats, tongs to rotate the vegetables on the grill, whisks to whip up some lavish mousses & strainers for our rich soups.

Little Urban Mission

We have been working and running successful restaurants collectively for 20 years. Now we cannot wait to bring Little Urban Food & Drinks to life! For the past 3 years we have been living and socializing in Williamsburg, we realized its missing something… a restaurant that is built around serving the neighborhood, reminiscent of the restaurants we grew up knowing & loving. The Little Urban culture will be to invest in our employees as well as our community. To create a family that extends beyond work & that cultivates a strong neighborhood bond.

We want to invite people to help our movement & in return get some gear, discounts and experiences that will help us get the keys to our new restaurant. 

The Start

Running a restaurant is hard, factor in New York and it can be intense! Together we have opened over half a dozen restaurants, with that cumulative experience, we know the amount of hard-work and dedication it takes to open and operate a restaurant smoothly. It is because of that experience,  that we are ready to get started on our own project. 

Help get the word out

We are building the Little Urban name on social media via Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest & SnapChat. If you're unable to donate their are other ways to get involved. Help share our campaign on social media, follow us or come in and experience our vision once we open!

story:
Are you ready for an exciting new take on Mexican food? Of course, you are!

VURRITO™ will be Rhode Island’s first, whole-food, plant-based, Mexican-Inspired food truck. Sourcing fresh, local, and 100% vegan ingredients. Oh, and did we mention? We’re here to change how New England eats! 

Lets face it. You're probably thinking about food right now. Food is an extremely important part of our lives. Food is much more than just getting nutrients into our body (If we even get that!). Food is a meal, a date, a business meeting, a casual encounter, a way to recharge, a reason to spend time with an old friend, a way to break up the workday, a way to take that much-needed moment to yourself.

Here's the problem. With our increasingly busy schedules we rarely have time for a healthy delicious meal. The current “quick and easy” options are not good for us and we know it. They leave us feeling sick and unsatisfied. Most of us grab the nearest, cheapest, and quickest thing we can find only to realize later that you end up tired, drained and ready to call it quits. We need an option that's going to make us happy, give us energy and nutrition, and leave us feeling good. That’s where we come in!

We understand that the best dining experience always starts with locally sourced, fresh ingredients. The food looks amazing and the aromas are captivating. There are flavor profiles throughout the dishes and you leave feeling good about yourself. Our focus is for every guest to have that experience - to have the opportunity to make a choice that is healthy, sustainable, familiar, delicious, cruelty-free, and environmentally friendly.

Each dish on VURRITO’s menu is made up entirely from whole-foods and vegetables. We’re talking sweet potatoes, eggplant, portobello mushrooms, peppers, avocados, summer squash, black beans and corn. Even our salsa, rice and Iesserts are fresh and unique. And remember, It's VURRITO’s goal to exceed your expectations when you choose to visit us.

VURRITO™ will be serving Rhode Island and Southern New England!  Although you will most likely see our delicious food truck throughout RI, MA, CT, and NY, We'll be headquartered in Pawtucket, RI. We feel that the city of Pawtucket is a great location! Not only for VURRITO™, but for the city and its residents as well. We have some history with the city and feel personally attached to Pawtucket in many ways. To this day we meet with our design team (also Pawtucket,RI residents) at the local pub on Armistice Blvd. Our COO and Co-Founder, Chris Kerwick grew up on Young Street in the shadows of McCoy Stadium in Pawtucket. The memories of games and fireworks at McCoy are held dear to him. To be part of the new generation and downtown revival that's happening in Pawtucket will be amazing!

We need your help! We're ready and eager to get to work! Chris and I are truly passionate about what we're doing and believe that VURRITO™ can change the world. But this isn't just about us, It’s about everyone. It’s about you! It’s about supporting the farmers we buy our produce from. It’s about our local community. It’s about our health. It’s about our planet. It’s about doing what’s right. VURRITO™ is the future. Will you help be a part of it?

We’re seeking $10,000 to help with the down payment on the food truck loan. We have bank financing in place and we’re pre-qualified for a small business loan. The $10,000 raised will be used specifically to secure the VURRITO™ Food Truck loan. We have a truck picked out and events lined up for later this summer! In return for your generous contributions, we have some amazing gifts in store for you! Hit the pink "BACK IT" button, like, and share! We hope to see you soon!

If you have any questions or comments in regards to this campaign and/or would like to contact VURRITO™ directly please email us at info@vurrito.com
story_txt: Are you ready for an exciting new take on Mexican food? Of course, you are!VURRITO™ will be Rhode Island’s first, whole-food, plant-based, Mexican-Inspired food truck. Sourcing fresh, local, and 100% vegan ingredients. Oh, and did we mention? We’re here to change how New England eats! Lets face it. You're probably thinking about food right now. Food is an extremely important part of our lives. Food is much more than just getting nutrients into our body (If we even get that!). Food is a meal, a date, a business meeting, a casual encounter, a way to recharge, a reason to spend time with an old friend, a way to break up the workday, a way to take that much-needed moment to yourself.Here's the problem. With our increasingly busy schedules we rarely have time for a healthy delicious meal. The current “quick and easy” options are not good for us and we know it. They leave us feeling sick and unsatisfied. Most of us grab the nearest, cheapest, and quickest thing we can find only to realize later that you end up tired, drained and ready to call it quits. We need an option that's going to make us happy, give us energy and nutrition, and leave us feeling good. That’s where we come in!We understand that the best dining experience always starts with locally sourced, fresh ingredients. The food looks amazing and the aromas are captivating. There are flavor profiles throughout the dishes and you leave feeling good about yourself. Our focus is for every guest to have that experience - to have the opportunity to make a choice that is healthy, sustainable, familiar, delicious, cruelty-free, and environmentally friendly.Each dish on VURRITO’s menu is made up entirely from whole-foods and vegetables. story:
We are passionate about building community in honest and tangible ways.One of those ways is to bring local business people together to work in ways that make things better for everyone.. The talent that Kristi and I bring to this commitment is customer service, and by using this ability in support of local farmers we have built a reputation of serving excellent products in a friendly manner to the people of Carrollton. For us the next step in working with our local farmers is to expand the market for their goods which is currently bottle-necked. It is important to expand the market so that our farmers can spend more of their time doing what they love and less time marketing and delivering their goods. This new venture will also open the market up to more of our neighbors to enjoy fresh local food. For 18 years our local donut maker had the best spot in Carrollton, its at the corner of 2 highways with 2 entrances where 30,000 people drive by everyday. No one was expecting him to close down so we weren’t prepared with capital when it happened, but we believe in what we’re doing, took a leap of faith, and signed the contract. Now we have less than a month to buy the equipment and get the place fixed up. The donut maker is selling his equipment and building to us at a very good price so that he doesn’t have to move it. We have given him 20% of his asking price, and he has given us a month to raise the rest of the money which is where this campaign comes in. We need to get enough to do some renovations, get a few more pieces of equipment, and cover start-up costs. We need great employees and want to pay a good wage while keeping our prices as low as possible.  This is good for everybody. It will be much easier to do all of this if we don’t have to borrow any money. We are asking for the bare minimum to get open, but if we get more, we will put it to good use for improvements like installing central air and inside seating.

We love to share perks so check them out. If you can’t contribute please share the campaign far and wide.

story:
OUR STORY

Little Bird is totally independent and founded in 2012 around the kitchen table in Peckham Rye, London. We set out to craft a smooth, small batch gin using just 10 botanicals, choosing not to add sugar, flavours or colours. Our passionate and pacy mission was to champion pink-grapefruit, sweet orange and ginger. An anomaly in the world of gin, Little Bird has captured hearts and imaginations with our smooth 'enjoy neat' over ice and nostalgic vibe.

FLYING SOUTH: THE LITTLE BIRD DISTILLERY 

We have taken our independent spirt and set up a craft distillery in an old disused railway arch under Peckham Rye station.  We live in Peckham and love this real, urban, gritty, creative place that we call home. A melting pot of great pubs, neighbourhood restaurants, markets, nightclubs, independent stores and artisan brands, our backyard has become known for its grass roots, kick arse, eclectic vibe and genuine community feel.

Connoisseurs of gin cocktails, we'll be crafting our small batch gin onsite in our very own 150 litre copper pot still (yet to be named). Our distillery space will develop as a tasting, eating, drinking, performance and exhibition space and if you're interested in something more intimate, bespoke events are all part of the plan too.

THOSE THREE LITTLE WORDS 

London Dry Gin tells you that the botanicals are natural and distilled along with the spirit to give a purer and higher quality spirit, no artificial flavourings or colourings are permitted before or after distillation. While the term London Dry is a nod to the style of gin, strangely, it doesn't mean that it's actually crafted in London too.  With your help, our new distillery will be in full swing from summer 2018.  It's good to know that we're the only distillery in this part of the metropolis too!

THE JOURNEY SO FAR...

From crafting Little Bird on a borrowed still in South London and launching at Maltby Street Market, regarded as the best 'foodie' market in London (you'll still find us here every weekend) to saving for own still, team Little Bird have been on a fast paced journey from the word go and now we're looking for investment to enable our independent brand to spread its wings.

Every weekend for the last five years, team Little Bird has set up our bustling little gin joint at Maltby Street market in an old railway arch (there's a theme here!). The arch, a joinery workshop during the week for an architectural salvage company - is transformed each weekend into a nostalgic, gin soaked experience for all to enjoy. Serving Red Snappers (the classy gin version of a Bloody Mary!) Breakfast Martinis, a changing menu of cocktails with names such as the Rhubarb Robin Negroni, the Peck’em and of course The Perfect G&T.  Amidst our eclectic mix of vintage tables and sparkling mismatched glasses, guests can relax and soak up our imaginative take on all things gin. 

#INDEPENDENT SPIRIT

With your help, we'd like to keep our brand independent and we're raising funds for equipment for our distillery and to develop the brand.

  • Reverse Osmosis equipment to enable us to cut spirit on-site.
  • Hand operated bottling line to bottle on-site.
  • Bottle sealing equipment to heat seal our bottles on-site.
  • Unique glass bottle designed for the Little Bird brand.

  • Website development, enabling us to sell our bottles online.

story:
Bienvenido al futuro de la cocina.

El objetivo de la campaña de indiegogo será para su última fase de fabricación, invirtiendo los beneficios en moldes y maquinaria necesaria, además de la inversión en materiales de primera calidad.

 El Frozen Cut es un cuchillo tecnológico, desarrollado y patentado en España, que combina las propiedades de un cuchillo de alto rendimiento con las ventajas de una plancha eléctrica. Esta cuchilla térmica tiene una cuchilla que se calienta hasta 200ºC simplemente presionando un botón, lo que permite cortar los productos congelados de manera limpia y sin esfuerzo. Quesos viejos o cualquier comida. También es perfecto para esparcir quesos, patés, mantequilla, etc.

ENFERMEDADES MOTORIZADAS: ayuda a cortar y rociar a personas con enfermedades como: distrofias, amiotrofías, miopatías, parálisis periódica, enfermedades musculares que causan inflamación y neuropatías. PERMITA QUE EL CORTE FACILITE EL MISMO Y ALINEE EL DOLOR QUE PUEDE SERÁ PRODUCIDO PARA CORTE O UNIRSE. Ayuda a cortar y rociar a las personas que se han sometido a una cirugía. PERMITA QUE EL CORTE FACILITE EL MISMO Y ALINEE EL DOLOR QUE PUEDE SER CAUSADO POR CORTE O ENLACE. Gracias por alcanzar los 200º de temperatura en solo 15 segundos, se cumplió con la desinfección completa y la descontaminación de las herramientas de corte, se cumplió con las españolas y se trató el sistema de Análisis de Peligros y Puntos de Control Crítico (HACCP).Los cuchillos son herramientas que están en uso continuo durante todo el día; Es fácil olvidar limpiarlos y desinfectarlos después de cada uso.FrozenCut es ideal para todas las empresas donde se manejan alimentos, como restaurantes, carnicerías, tiendas de delicatessen, salas de corte, etc. Permite la desinfección y la esterilización completa, mejorando otros sistemas, como la lejanía y la maquinaria compleja.

 ¿Qué hay en la caja?

1 unidad de cuchillo FrozenCut dos temperaturas 100º-200º centígrados.

1 transformador de corriente.

1 libro de instrucciones.

El equipo.

Diseño y desarrollo.

Tecnología de patente de primer paso.

Segundo paso de diseño y registro de producto.

Prototipos de tercer paso.

Cuarto paso, elegir modelos.

Quinto paso, fabricamos unidades para ensayos.

 

Este es nuestro día de laboratorio.  

                  Sometemos FrozenCut a las pruebas más duras.

El siguiente video resume el cuchillo y el desarrollo.

Muchas personas han probado FrozenCut en diferentes eventos y demostraciones, incluido un chef profesional. ¡Se sorprendieron y sus comentarios son muy positivos!

Vea lo que dicen los profesionales:  http: //territoriogastronomico.com/utensilios/fr ...

https: //proveedoreshosteltur.com/textil-y-compl ...

http: //www.frozencut.com/prensa/10-inventos-que ...

 

FrozenCut ya es reconocido gracias a los premios recibidos, solo con prototipos.  

1er Premio Eureka 2016-2017 para el mejor invento e inventor en Europa.

2º Premio Nacional de Tecnología 2016.

1er Premio y medalla de oro a la mejor innovación de cocina en Europa.

Esta cuchilla térmica tiene una cuchilla que se calienta hasta 200ºC simplemente presionando un botón, lo que permite cortar los productos congelados de manera limpia y sin esfuerzo. Gracias por alcanzar los 200º de temperatura en solo 15 segundos, se cumplió con la desinfección completa y la descontaminación de las herramientas de corte, se cumplió con las españolas y se trató el sistema de Análisis de Peligros y Puntos de Control Crítico (HACCP).Los cuchillos son herramientas que están en uso continuo durante todo el día; Es fácil olvidar limpiarlos y desinfectarlos después de cada uso.FrozenCut es ideal para todas las empresas donde se manejan alimentos, como restaurantes, carnicerías, tiendas de delicatessen, salas de corte, etc. Permite la desinfección y la esterilización completa, mejorando otros sistemas, como la lejanía y la maquinaria compleja. ¿Qué hay en la caja?1 unidad de cuchillo FrozenCut dos temperaturas 100º-200º centígrados.1 transformador de corriente.1 libro de instrucciones. El equipo.Diseño y desarrollo.Tecnología de patente de primer paso.Segundo paso de diseño y registro de producto.Prototipos de tercer paso.Cuarto paso, elegir modelos.Quinto paso, fabricamos unidades para ensayos. Este es nuestro día de laboratorio.                    Sometemos FrozenCut a las pruebas más duras.

Muchas personas han probado FrozenCut en diferentes eventos y demostraciones, incluido un chef profesional. ¡Se sorprendieron y sus comentarios son muy positivos!
Vea lo que dicen los profesionales:  http: //territoriogastronomico.com/utensilios/fr ...
https: //proveedoreshosteltur.com/textil-y-compl ...
http: //www.frozencut.com/prensa/10-inventos-que ...
 
FrozenCut ya es reconocido gracias a los premios recibidos, solo con prototipos.  
1er Premio Eureka 2016-2017 para el mejor invento e inventor en Europa.
2º Premio Nacional de Tecnología 2016.
1er Premio y medalla de oro a la mejor innovación de cocina en Europa. 

Riesgos y desafíos
Es la primera vez que desarrollamos un producto de cocina, en tres años de trabajo intenso, diseñamos, patentamos y desarrollamos los primeros prototipos funcionales, y estamos listos para su producción. Estamos muy emocionados y necesitamos el último impulso con todos ustedes para alcanzar la meta final.


Gracias

story:
Thank you for taking a few moments to watch the video, now here’s a little back story.

 

THE FOUNDATION

My name is Jordan Johnson and I am the Founder, CEO, and Chief Cookie Creator of Jordan’s Cookies—first began when I was at the tender age of 8 years old—which is an online business that freshly bakes and ships cookies across the country to individuals as well as corporate customers.

I come from an entrepreneurial family as my parents are both independent business owners, and from a young age they taught me the values of creating a business out of something you love, and as many 8 year olds, I had a deep love for sweets, specifically cookies!

Inspired by both my parents as well as other positive influencers around me, I was always looking for ways to get involved and create something original and creative, within the confines of my innovative mindset—a young entrepreneur in the making! 

So, one day my parents participated in a neighborhood garage sale, and I thought this was the perfect opportunity to share my love of cookies with the rest of our community. With the help of my mom, we bought 200 cookies the previous night, and along with my dad, we created a stand in front of our driveway. 

The next morning, I was up bright and early, ready for the excitement of the day to begin. So many people came by to my stand and absolutely loved this go-getter, entrepreneurial spirit of mine! I was overjoyed with the amount of love and support I had received from our community, and from that day on, I knew I wanted to bake my own cookies EVERY SINGLE DAY and share them with our neighborhood, city, state, country, even the world, to put a smile on a face, to make someone’s day a little brighter.

                                     

Now granted, since I was 8 that was not possible, as I had to go to school the following Monday! However, I sat down with my parents and we created a plan to grow the idea of Jordan’s Cookies and expand it into concept, and in the future, a fully-functioning business. 

In 2008, when I was 8 years old, Jordan’s Cookies was born. I partnered with a family friend who had experience in catering to help us get the business off the ground. We worked on flavors, packaging, and delivery with her original recipe. Our then partner realized that she wanted to retire from the food business, so we were left with having to re-establish the brand independently. 

With the help of my mom, and countless days of trial-and-error, we established what is known as our Original and Signature Jordan’s Cookies Cookie Dough. 

YEAR-OVER-YEAR GROWTH

Over the next few years, we had marginal success by selling small orders of cookies in my neighborhood and to family friends while still managing school and extracurricular activities. 

Around this time, my grandmother who has since past away, was battling various forms of cancer. As a family, we have always been tied to service, giving back, and helping others, and we donated 10% of the proceeds of every single order to the “Susan G. Komen Foundation for Cancer Research” further cultivating our slogan, “Where Sweetness Makes a Difference”. 

I also created a nonprofit organization called “Change for Cures” where students in local schools would compete between classrooms to see who could raise the most money in a given period of time. The classroom that raised the most amount of money received a Cookies and Milk Party sponsored by Jordan’s Cookies. 

Making additional steps towards growth, in 2013 we established our first fully functioning e-commerce website that drastically improved and expanded our brand to a national level. As we continued to grow and expand, we have moved out of the driveway and are currently renting space in a commercial kitchen facility—a great blessing by a friend and fellow baking mentor—where we have a team of volunteers who help us bake and package every order. 

AWARDS AND PRESS

As business grew exponentially, there we’re many nights of baking until 3 am and waking up for school at 5 am, but I managed to make it work. We’ve served thousands of people, won several local and international awards, have spoken to a variety of audiences, and have been able to work with countless companies including Williams-Sonoma, FedEx and ReMax, just to name a few. I currently serve as the Teen Entrepreneur of the year for the Gwinnett County Public School System in Georgia, the most diverse in the Southeast with over 900,000 residents.

FUNDING UTILIZATION

Now, lets talk about our plan of action for future growth. We are so very thankful for the opportunity to share the commercial kitchen facility we are currently operating in, however as we continue to grow and expand, we realize that for maximum efficiency it is necessary for us to operate within our own facility.

Currently, Jordan’s Cookies is solely an online business, and upon fulfilling orders, we are only available to bake, package, and ship once a week in the shared space. This means, that we have to bulk all orders, regardless of when they are placed online, into one mass ship day.

As a brand, it is our main priority to care for our customers as we would want to be cared for by the brands we love and support. Through our own warehouse facility, we would have the freedom to process orders everyday of the week, providing an overall better experience for our customers.

Once we have the funds to open the facility, we would need the equipment for operation. Down below is a list of all items necessary to instill in the bakery: Equipment, Utility, Supplies, Packaging, Ingredients, and Salary Pay.

 

The Jordan Johnson Foundation

The Jordan Johnson Foundation, established in 2018 by Teen Entrepreneur Jordan Johnson, works to uplift and provide support for the youth in their beginning entrepreneurial journeys.

 

There are 3 main components to the Foundation: Scholarship Funds, The JC Intensives, and The Workshop Conferences.

 

Yearly, the Foundation plans to donate Scholarships to various high school seniors around the country, who plan to pursue a degree in a business/entrepreneurial venture. The application process is open to all, and from the many deserving candidates, we will select a few to award.

 

The JC Intensives, an annual 3-4 day retreat, selects 10 students (with up to 2 guests) who have started the beginning phases of running a company. From meeting some dynamic business leaders to forming a network with the other kids, we will provide information that can be put into practice on their own for the future. 

 

The Workshop Conferences, a yearly Forum event where thousands of students, primarily from lower income communities, will have the opportunity to learn about entrepreneurship and the possibilities of forming their own company. A full day event, we will provide 3 meals, snacks, and a fun activity. With guest speakers, breakout groups, a Q & A session, plus teaching them how to turn their interests and talents into a business, the children will begin to view lives and futures from a different perspective.

 

IN CLOSING

That being said, I cannot do this alone. With the help of you, my dreams can be made possible. To be in this situation is humbling and I am extremely thankful for those that have helped me get to the position I am in now. This is not simply my business, anyone and everyone who has contributed to the JC brand in all ways possible is a blessing in my life, and plays a vital role in the future growth of Jordan's Cookies.

I push myself to be the best that I can be, to achieve the impossible, for those that believe in me, for those that look up to me, for the future generations.

As the CEO and Founder of Jordan’s Cookies from a young age, I have learned that you never know what could come if you do not try, the answer will always be no if you do not ask, and you cannot succeed if you do not start with something.

I can assure you that I am passionate, able, capable, and will do everything in my power to build, grow, and expand this business towards success. We are in a period of positive challenges which can only bring newfound opportunities, something I so greatly look forward to. To be able to continue providing satisfaction for our customers is my pride and joy, the reason I continue to approach these obstacles head on, to achieve the impossible.

If you are financially able to donate towards my dream, I truly thank you. If you are not in a position to financially support, there are other ways you can help. We must spread the word to as many people as possible. I would love if you could copy this link and post on social media so that others can view our story. If you can encourage at least 10 of your friends to share as well, we will reach our goal! Thank you so much, and I look forward to the future of Jordan's Cookies with you.
story_txt: Thank you for taking a few moments to watch the video, now here’s a little back story. THE FOUNDATIONMy name is Jordan Johnson and I am the Founder, CEO, and Chief Cookie Creator of Jordan’s Cookies—first began when I was at the tender age of 8 years old—which is an online business that freshly bakes and ships cookies across the country to individuals as well as corporate customers.I come from an entrepreneurial family as my parents are both independent business owners, and from a young age they taught me the values of creating a business out of something you love, and as many 8 year olds, I had a deep love for sweets, specifically cookies!Inspired by both my parents as well as other positive influencers around me, I was always looking for ways to get involved and create something original and creative, within the confines of my innovative mindset—a young entrepreneur in the making! So, one day my parents participated in a neighborhood garage sale, and I thought this was the perfect opportunity to share my love of cookies with the rest of our community. With the help of my mom, we bought 200 cookies the previous night, and along with my dad, we created a stand in front of our driveway. The next morning, I was up bright and early, ready for the excitement of the day to begin. So many people came by to my stand and absolutely loved this go-getter, entrepreneurial spirit of mine! I was overjoyed with the amount of love and support I had received from our community, and from that day on, I knew I wanted to bake my own cookies EVERY SINGLE DAY and share them with our neighborhood, city, state, country, even the world, to put a smile on a face, to make someone’s day a little brighter.                                     Now granted, since I was 8 that was not possible, as I had to go to school the following Monday! However, I sat down with my parents and we created a plan to grow the idea of Jordan’s Cookies and expand it into concept, and in the future, a fully-functioning business. In 2008, when I was 8 years old, Jordan’s Cookies was born. I partnered with a family friend who had experience in catering to help us get the business off the ground. We worked on flavors, packaging, and delivery with her original recipe. Our then partner realized that she wanted to retire from the food business, so we were left with having to re-establish the brand independently. With the help of my mom, and countless days of trial-and-error, we established what is known as our Original and Signature Jordan’s Cookies Cookie Dough. YEAR-OVER-YEAR GROWTHOver the next few years, we had marginal success by selling small orders of cookies in my neighborhood and to family friends while still managing school and extracurricular activities. Around this time, my grandmother who has since past away, was battling various forms of cancer. As a family, we have always been tied to service, giving back, and helping others, and we donated 10% of the proceeds of every single order to the “Susan G. Komen Foundation for Cancer Research” further cultivating our slogan, “Where Sweetness Makes a Difference”. I also created a nonprofit organization called “Change for Cures” where students in local schools would compete between classrooms to see who could raise the most money in a given period of time. The classroom that raised the most amount of money received a Cookies and Milk Party sponsored by Jordan’s Cookies. Making additional steps towards growth, in 2013 we established our first fully functioning e-commerce website that drastically improved and expanded our brand to a national level. As we continued to grow and expand, we have moved out of the driveway and are currently renting space in a commercial kitchen facility—a great blessing by a friend and fellow baking mentor—where we have a team of volunteers who help us bake and package every order. AWARDS AND PRESSAs business grew exponentially, there we’re many nights of baking until 3 am and waking up for school at 5 am, but I managed to make it work. We’ve served thousands of people, won several local and international awards, have spoken to a variety of audiences, and have been able to work with countless companies including Williams-Sonoma, FedEx and ReMax, just to name a few. I currently serve as the Teen Entrepreneur of the year for the Gwinnett County Public School System in Georgia, the most diverse in the Southeast with over 900,000 residents.FUNDING UTILIZATIONNow, lets talk about our plan of action for future growth. We are so very thankful for the opportunity to share the commercial kitchen facility we are currently operating in, however as we continue to grow and expand, we realize that for maximum efficiency it is necessary for us to operate within our own facility.Currently, Jordan’s Cookies is solely an online business, and upon fulfilling orders, we are only available to bake, package, and ship once a week in the shared space. This means, that we have to bulk all orders, regardless of when they are placed online, into one mass ship day.As a brand, it is our main priority to care for our customers as we would want to be cared for by the brands we love and support. Through our own warehouse facility, we would have the freedom to process orders everyday of the week, providing an overall better experience for our customers.Once we have the funds to open the facility, we would need the equipment for operation. Down below is a list of all items necessary to instill in the bakery: Equipment, Utility, Supplies, Packaging, Ingredients, and Salary Pay. The Jordan Johnson FoundationThe Jordan Johnson Foundation, established in 2018 by Teen Entrepreneur Jordan Johnson, works to uplift and provide support for the youth in their beginning entrepreneurial journeys. There are 3 main components to the Foundation: Scholarship Funds, The JC Intensives, and The Workshop Conferences. Yearly, the Foundation plans to donate Scholarships to various high school seniors around the country, who plan to pursue a degree in a business/entrepreneurial venture. The application process is open to all, and from the many deserving candidates, we will select a few to award. The JC Intensives, an annual 3-4 day retreat, selects 10 students (with up to 2 guests) who have started the beginning phases of running a company. From meeting some dynamic business leaders to forming a network with the other kids, we will provide information that can be put into practice on their own for the future.  The Workshop Conferences, a yearly Forum event where thousands of students, primarily from lower income communities, will have the opportunity to learn about entrepreneurship and the possibilities of forming their own company. A full day event, we will provide 3 meals, snacks, and a fun activity. With guest speakers, breakout groups, a Q & A session, plus teaching them how to turn their interests and talents into a business, the children will begin to view lives and futures from a different perspective. IN CLOSINGThat being said, I cannot do this alone. With the help of you, my dreams can be made possible. To be in this situation is humbling and I am extremely thankful for those that have helped me get to the position I am in now. This is not simply my business, anyone and everyone who has contributed to the JC brand in all ways possible is a blessing in my life, and plays a vital role in the future growth of Jordan's Cookies.I push myself to be the best that I can be, to achieve the impossible, for those that believe in me, for those that look up to me, for the future generations.As the CEO and Founder of Jordan’s Cookies from a young age, I have learned that you never know what could come if you do not try, the answer will always be no if you do not ask, and you cannot succeed if you do not start with something.I can assure you that I am passionate, able, capable, and will do everything in my power to build, grow, and expand this business towards success. We are in a period of positive challenges which can only bring newfound opportunities, something I so greatly look forward to. To be able to continue providing satisfaction for our customers is my pride and joy, the reason I continue to approach these obstacles head on, to achieve the impossible.If you are financially able to donate towards my dream, I truly thank you. If you are not in a position to financially support, there are other ways you can help. We must spread the word to as many people as possible. I would love if you could copy this link and post on social media so that others can view our story. If you can encourage at least 10 of your friends to share as well, we will reach our goal! Thank you so much, and I look forward to the future of Jordan's Cookies with you.

story:
No product compares to how 100% Clean PlantVital is – not Vega, Greens Plus, Optimum Nutrition, or Amazing Grass. We use the term "100% Clean" because it’s what makes PlantVital so transformative. It means we use ONLY the most nutrient-dense ingredients that are vital to your health, and NOTHING ELSE. We don’t add one single additional ingredient to manipulate flavor, texture, smell, color, or to concoct marketing claims. 

 

 

What Are You Putting into Your Body?

You trust your daily nutritional supplement to be the purest, most nutrient-dense thing you consume everyday, but can you?

  • "Natural Flavors" is a blanket term used in most supplements that typically means various types of sugars, and often caramel flavoring (PlantVital contains no "Natural Flavors").
  • "Clean Factory" means a factory that is government checked to be allergen free of nuts, soy, dairy and eggs (PlantVital's manufacturing plant has this certification).

​

​How is PlantVital Different?

The answer is right in front of you... well, right now it's in your kitchen cabinet on the back of the protein supplement you're currently taking. Thankfully, in the US companies cant lie on their ingredient list. Take a look, then take a look at ours.

  • 26 GRAMS COMPLETE PROTEIN. The highest in the plant based protein market.
  • NON-ALLERGENIC. Faster absorption by the body compared to beef broth, collagen and whey proteins.
  • CONVENIENT. 100% water-soluble and packs easily guaranteeing nutrition while travelling.​

​

How Does PlantVital Taste?

How Does PlantVital Work?

PlantVital is your daily nutritional insurance policy. 30 seconds each morning to stir, sip, and get on with your day knowing you're covered. Each 1 pound pouch of PlantVital contains a 2 week supply of nutrient dense complete health support - Each scoop contains:

  • 26 grams of Plant Based Complete Protein
  • All Essential Branch Chain Amino Acids
  • Nutrients and Micronutrients
  • 1 Billion CPU Probiotics
  • Vitamins and Minerals from 20 Superfoods, Fruits and Vegetables 
  • Whole Food Derived Organic Antioxidants 

This means:

  • Increased Energy Levels
  • Improved Stress and Sleep Management
  • Heightened Brain Function, including Memory and Concentration
  • Improved Lean Muscle Growth
  • Increased Digestive Health through Balanced Alkalinity
  • Increased Balanced Blood Sugar
  • Detoxification and Liver Support

Why I Developed PlantVital?

Hello Fellow Health Fans,

I’m a chef, father to two young girls, and a relatively active guy - but not obsessive, I eat mostly clean, but I love a glass of wine, and I don’t always make the best food decisions (I have a crazy sweet tooth). 

Like perhaps many of you, I recently decided to cut down on red meat, but I didn’t want to compromise protein, so I started researching plant based protein supplements. 

Side note - I’m a food label geek – I Google those odd ingredients at the bottom of food labels. I like to know what I’m eating. I was quickly surprised, in-fact shocked at what these products contain - the very ingredients I try so hard to avoid! 

What I wanted didn't exist, so I sourced out the best nutraceutical scientists in the US, and after months of research and several dozen formulations we made it! And here we are today. 

I created this product and launched this campaign because I believe there are others out there like me. Perhaps you? We have spent the last six months obsessing over a product we believe in. And we know that once you try it, taste it, and experience how you feel you too will become a fan.

I invite you to join us by investing in your health. It’s the one gift you not only give to yourself but to those who love you. 

The best of health,
Mike - Founder, PlantVital

How To Invest In Your Health

Your investment is in your own health. Pick the offer that best suits you, and shortly you'll be experiencing the benefits of powerful daily nutrition.

  • After the Indiegogo campaign is complete you will receive your PlantVital
  • Your investment includes Free Shipping, you pay only what's posted below
  • PlantVital will be available on Amazon.com after the campaign
  • We do and will always offer a 100% - 60 Day Money Back Guarantee on PlantVital

Deliverables Timeline

  • July - Launch Indigogo Campiagn (60 days)
  • Aug/Sep - 100% of Indiegogo funds received go into the opening production order
  • Oct/Nov - PlantVital orders are delivered to our investors
  • November - PlantVital is available on Amazon.com for re-ordering (and general public)
  • Moving forward - As an original PlantVital investor you will receive periodical coupon codes accessing heavy discounts for PlantVital (for yourself AND great gift ideas)

​

Let's Make a REAL Change, Together!

Together we can make a true, authentic difference in the lives of people we love - not only by your financial investment, but by spreading the word of PlantVital and the knowledge surrounding what were doing. Here's how;

  • Spread the word across your social media channels
  • Use the Indiegogo social tools to tell loved ones about PlantVital
  • Send the gift of good health by investing as gifts for loved ones
  • If you work in the food, health, fitness and wellness space and/or a social media influencer in these areas we would also love to hear from you to discuss partnering opportunities. 

Your Thoughts & Comments Are Vital 

  • info@plantvital.com
  • 1 800 985-4220
  • PlantVital.com (including live chat support between 9am/5pm EST)
  • @PlantVitalNutrition (instagram)

Your life long robust health is our only goal. Thank you for allowing that most treasured asset to be a part of our dream.

story:
Introducing VitaminEnergy™, the world’s first energy drink super infused with vitamins that support a healthy immune system while sky-rocketing your energy levels!

VitaminEnergy™ Benefits:

Boost Energy!

Great Taste!

Immune System Support!

ZERO Carbs!

NO Sugar Crash!

Now, when you are on the go, you can take a shot of VitaminEnergy™ to supercharge your body. The proprietary energy blend along with the super-infusion of vitamins provides for better, more sustainable energy than other leading energy drinks.

This is the perfect pre-workout supplement, helping to boost your immune system while giving you a surge of energy. 

If you're on the go, take a shot of VitaminEnergy™ to rejuvenate your mind and body.  

Energy drinks don't have to be unhealthy.   

With VitaminEnergy™, you get the best of both world, healthy, sustainable energy with a big boost to your immune system.

Best of all, it tastes great!

With VitaminEnergy™, you can boost your immune health and energy while on the go.   

We've added as much Vitamin C as Emergen-C, which, if taken daily, will help support your immune health.

VitaminEnergy™ - 0 Sugar, 0 Carbs

VitaminEnergy™ contains no sugar and no carbs.   

 

VitaminEnergy™- Loaded With Vitamin C

All VitaminEnergy™ shots are loaded with 1,000mg of Vitamin C, the same amount as Emergen-C.

What is vitamin C and why is it important?

Vitamin C is needed for the growth and repair of tissues in all parts of your body. It is used to: Form an important protein used to make skin, tendons, ligaments, and blood vessels. Heal wounds and form scar tissue.

Why is vitamin C important for skin?

Protecting Your Skin From the Effects of Aging. Vitamin C is not only necessary for collagen production and maintenance, but it is also a potent antioxidant that can neutralize free radicals in the skin. Free radicals are atoms or molecules with an unpaired electron. ... Here is how they damage the skin and cause aging.

What is the definition and importance of vitamin C?

What is Vitamin C good for in the body?A water-soluble vitamin important for healthy skin, teeth, bones, and blood vessels. It is found especially in citrus fruits, tomatoes, potatoes, and green leafy vegetables. A deficiency of vitamin C in the diet causes scurvy. Also called ascorbic acid.

What is Vitamin C good for in the body?

Vitamin C (also known as ascorbic acid) is abundant in vegetables and fruits. A water-soluble vitamin and powerful antioxidant, it helps the body form and maintain connective tissue, including bones, blood vessels, and skin.

What happens if we do not get enough vitamin C?

What happens if I don't get enough vitamin C? ... People who get little or no vitamin C (below about 10 mg per day) for many weeks can get scurvy. Scurvy causes fatigue, inflammation of the gums, small red or purple spots on the skin, joint pain, poor wound healing, and corkscrew hairs.

What are the health benefits of vitamin C?

It may not be the cure for the common cold (though it's thought to help prevent more serious complications). But the benefits of vitamin C may include protection against immune system deficiencies, cardiovascular disease, prenatal health problems, eye disease, and even skin wrinkling.

How much vitamin C is safe to take in a day?

For adults, the recommended dietary reference intake for vitamin C is 65 to 90 milligrams (mg) a day, and the upper limit is 2,000 mg a day. 

 

VitaminEnergy™ - Safe Levels of Vitamin B

VitaminEnergy™ has safe levels of Vitamin B.   5 Hour Energy and other branded energy drinks are overloaded with Vitamin B to the point where some say it can be dangerous.

What are the benefits of taking Vitamin B?

Plays an important role in keeping our bodies running like well-oiled machines. These essential nutrients help convert our food into fuel, allowing us to stay energized throughout the day.

What happens if you get too much vitamin B?

Taking too much vitamin B6 can cause nerve damage, but vitamin B12 is safe for most people. Sufficient amounts of vitamin B6 and vitamin B12 are needed to stay well and feel your best, but it's possible to get too much of these vitamins if you take supplements.

What Vitamin B is good for your skin?

The Benefits of Vitamin B. ... In particular, Nicotinamide, a derivative of Vitamin B3 (Niacin), has been shown to improve the ability of the epidermis, the upper-most layer of the skin, to retain moisture – leading to softer, smoother skin with less dryness and flakiness, and a reduction of fine lines.

What happens if your vitamin B is low?

Having vitamin B12 deficiency means that your body does not have enough of this vitamin. You need B12 to make red blood cells , which carry oxygen through your body. Not having enough B12 can lead to anemia, which means your body does not have enough red blood cells to do the job. This can make you feel weak and tired.

 

WARNING:  Sugar Packed Energy Drinks

 

Sugar Crash 

A sugar crash or glucose crash is the fatigue after consuming a large quantity of carbohydrates, also known as reactive hypoglycemia, related to homeostatic systems utilized by the body to control blood sugar levels.

Sugar Rots Teeth

- Tooth decay is caused by bacteria in the mouth using sugar from foods and drinks to produce acids that dissolve and damage the teeth. 

- Sugar sweetened beverages have high levels of sugar and drinking these can significantly contribute to tooth decay. 

- Regular and ‘diet' soft drinks, sports drinks, energy drinks, fruit juices, fruit drinks and cordials also have high acid levels that can cause tooth erosion. 

- Tooth erosion occurs when acid attacks the teeth to dissolve the outer surface of tooth enamel. 

- Regular loss of enamel can lead to cavities and exposure of the inner layers of the tooth that may become sensitive and painful. 

- Prevention of enamel loss is very important for the long term health of your teeth. 

- Each acid attack lasts for around 20 minutes. Every time you take a sip of the drink, the acid damage begins all over again.

FDA:  5-Hour Energy Cited in 13 Deaths

According to the U.S. Food and Drug Administration, 5-Hour Energy has been linked to deaths across the country.

5-Hour Energy contains 8,333 percent of the recommended daily value of vitamin B12. 

This in conjunction with the 215+ mg of caffeine in these shots could be potentially deadly. 

VitaminEnergy™ is the Healthy Alternative To Sugared Down and Overloaded Energy Drinks

More Energy!

Great Taste!

Healthy Immune System!

ZERO Carbs!

NO Sugar Crash!

 

What's In VitaminEnergy™?

 

The Healthy Energy Drink

 

VitaminEnergy™ is the healthy alternative to sugared down energy drinks.  VitaminEnergy™ tastes great, gives you more energy than a cup of coffee, and provides support to your immune system.

You need B12 to make red blood cells , which carry oxygen through your body. Not having enough B12 can lead to anemia, which means your body does not have enough red blood cells to do the job. This can make you feel weak and tired. WARNING:  Sugar Packed Energy Drinks Sugar Crash A sugar crash or glucose crash is the fatigue after consuming a large quantity of carbohydrates, also known as reactive hypoglycemia, related to homeostatic systems utilized by the body to control blood sugar levels.Sugar Rots Teeth- Tooth decay is caused by bacteria in the mouth using sugar from foods and drinks to produce acids that dissolve and damage the teeth. - Sugar sweetened beverages have high levels of sugar and drinking these can significantly contribute to tooth decay. - Regular and ‘diet' soft drinks, sports drinks, energy drinks, fruit juices, fruit drinks and cordials also have high acid levels that can cause tooth erosion. - Tooth erosion occurs when acid attacks the teeth to dissolve the outer surface of tooth enamel. - Regular loss of enamel can lead to cavities and exposure of the inner layers of the tooth that may become sensitive and painful. - Prevention of enamel loss is very important for the long term health of your teeth. - Each acid attack lasts for around 20 minutes. Every time you take a sip of the drink, the acid damage begins all over again.FDA:  5-Hour Energy Cited in 13 DeathsAccording to the U.S. Food and Drug Administration, 5-Hour Energy has been linked to deaths across the country.5-Hour Energy contains 8,333 percent of the recommended daily value of vitamin B12. This in conjunction with the 215+ mg of caffeine in these shots could be potentially deadly. VitaminEnergy™ is the Healthy Alternative To Sugared Down and Overloaded Energy Drinks
More Energy!
Great Taste!
Healthy Immune System!
ZERO Carbs!
NO Sugar Crash! What's In VitaminEnergy™? The Healthy Energy Drink VitaminEnergy™  is the healthy alternative to sugared down energy drinks.  VitaminEnergy™ tastes great, gives you more energy than a cup of coffee, and provides support to your immune system.

story:
We are a team of five with an ambitious goal: to redefine the meaning of “handcrafted” spirits.

How will we accomplish this? For us it all starts with the selection of ingredients. We work with the most superior quality, because our products can only be as good as our raw materials. From there, we do everything ourselves, literally with our own hands, to ensure quality: the cleaning, the peeling, the cutting, the mashing, the distilling, the packaging, the labeling, and the shipping. And of course, we use the best distilling machine available on the market for small batch manufacturing.

We are doing all of this at a unique heritage industrial brick building in Berlin that we are in the process of restoring for you, because we want you to visit us and witness our manufacturing process. We want to share our knowledge with you through our extraordinary tastings and professional workshops. And we want you to become a part of our mission to create exceptional, never before seen handcrafted spirits.

A major step towards our goal is our product launch in October when we would like to thrill you, and the rest of the world, with a range of perfectly handcrafted spirits.

We are addressing all those who love handcrafted products that are manufactured with passion as much as we do.

In supporting our project, you will become part of our mission to revolutionize the spirits market and create the best spirits ever. You will have the opportunity to witness the manufacturing at our heritage site, where we will be handing out precious perks. We will be presenting what we were able to achieve with your support at a special event, which we will also be taking as an opportunity to let you be part of our vision for the future of the Craft Spirits Distillery.

 

The funds raised through this campaign will be used to furnish our manufactory and to develop and manufacture products, including the bottles, labels, and demijohns in which our spirits will ripen to their fullest and smoothest taste.

 

Are YOU prepared for the ultimate spirits adventure? Then please support us. Now!

 

And this is our Team:

Tim

He is our creative and strategic mastermind. He studied business administration and has been among the 200 best ad photographers, successfully producing global image campaigns. He always comes up with unbelievable new product ideas.

Julia

She is our highly communicative Social Media Influencer and is well-connected in the Berlin bar scene.

Konrad

Our pharmacist, who has a doctor’s degree in natural science, is searching locally and globally for new, handpicked ingredients for our unique spirits. He is also in charge of R&D, creating new recipes, and of quality assurance.

Norbert

Our Master Distiller is full of passion for his craft. He is enthusiastic about combining the centuries-old tradition of distilling with the possibilities of creating small batches of completely new, never before seen spirits.

Dorina

She is the soul of our team, our MacGyver, keeping an eye on everything in our manufactory. She is always busy and hard to get a hold of.

 

Find more here on our website: http://premium-craft-distillery.com/en/

story:
My name is Bart Greenhut, I'm a successful inventor/entrepreneur living in Los Angeles. An invention of mine was once chosen one of the 100 most significant products developed in the world! This is better!

And, I love chocolate chip cookies!

Chocolate chips are "America's cookies!" I grew up on great chocolate chip cookies back in the Woodstock era, before the large corporations morphed them into cardboard tasting masses of over-sweet dough, inferior chocolate, synthesized oils, and unhealthy sweeteners. 

My chocolate chip cookies are my legacy and a great big "thank you" to AMERICA, the high point of my career.

 

Call me old fashioned BUT

Over the recent past a few large corporations and investment banks have quietly scooped-up virtually all of the developing brands of quality, chocolate chip cookies. They bought distribution, and once their initial business model was fulfilled.. they dropped the hammer, degraded the product and sold-out the American public.  I hate that.

Corners are cut and quality is compromised. The brands are milked and the American public is bilked. This has happened repeatedly.

I'd go to the store and buy cookies that used to be amazing. I'd open the package and notice the cookies looked a little different. I bite in and that's when the betrayal hits. They've sold me out!

Americans should NOT be sold-out. 

 

Giving you what you deserve!

Our homemade-style cookies are natural and made with only the highest quality ingredients REAL butter, FRESH eggs, Madagascar vanilla and the FINEST, Belgian chocolate. 

Space-age technology

Our proprietary technology (developed first for the U.S. space program) allows our cookies to retain their "just baked" freshness without the use of synthesized oils, preservatives or chemical ANYTHING!  

But the story doesn't end there. We learned how to bake them in massive scale and provide them at a price that can compete with all the lesser quality, commodity cookies!

The Results...

...from Kevin Smith (filmmaker, actor, podcaster) “The cookies are really good. I may even go on record to say they ARE the best chocolate chip cookies I’ve ever had. And when you open the box, you fall down a rabbit hole of Bart’s life...”

 

How We're The Best

We don’t believe in gluttony or tricking people into eating beyond what makes them feel comfortable - so our cookies are bite-size, naturally, deliciously portion controlled, so to speak.

I'm not a television personality and I'm not a spokesman but, people love our cookies so much that on several occasions I sold over 2 million cookies on QVC in under 8 minutes!

 

Shark Tank & Bad Advice 

Contrary to Shark Tank advice, high quality food products are NEVER outsourced to co-packers!  That's why we bake every cookie in-house and all of our cookie-makers have been with us for the full life of this 7-year-old company. And many worked with us in our previous family business. We're a family and a team and we take great pride in baking The Best Chocolate Chip Cookies In The World!

 

 

Why Indiegogo Now? 

A few weeks ago the building where we make the cookies was put up for sale without prior notice. Bummer!

We're self-financed, and I'm 71 so there's nary a moment to waste.

This move was a huge wave of sudden expenses.  In fact it cost FAR more than the $10K we’ve set as our initial goal. It could set us back but around here we see adversity as opportunity. We're turning this frown upside down by reaching out to the Indiegogo community to tell our story.

Are you like me? Are you tired of being sold out?  To some people this may seem ridiculous BUT the principle is very important.

Every contribution matters, no matter how big or small, makes you an important part of our ongoing story. And we deeply appreciate every single one of you.

"Our cookies are dedicated to everyone who refuses to compromise their ideals for dollars"

Where The Money Will Go

A small list of our moving costs include:

$3,400.00 Expedited permits

$4,000.00 Epoxy floor and repair drains

$8,500.00 Wash-down walls and ceiling

$5,700.00 Electrical

$5,900.00 Plumbing

__________________

$27,500 Sub-Total, but...

...there are MORE bills than we listed.  Today we're focused on forming a community of unconventional thinkers and believers who will keep us company along the way.

We'll be returning REAL, first-quality, home-made style chocolate chip cookies back to America! We invite you to participate! This will be fun and you'll receive lots of additional perks along the way.

Join us. Try our cookies! Participate! thank you!

A Perk On Top Of The Perks

In addition to getting The World’s Best Chocolate Chip Cookies delivered directly to your door, every single person who backs us will be invited for cookies and coffee at our new factory -- where we’ll celebrate the continuing joy and pride of doing the seemingly impossible!

So PLEASE contribute, enjoy our cookies and tell at least ONE person about our campaign!

They're out of this world! 

Love,

Bart

story:
INTRODUCTION

TSUBI SOUP is for anyone who wants to fit more delicious, plant-based foods into their life. Whether you’re a diehard vegan or simply veggie-curious, TSUBI SOUP will add function to your snack-time and become a simple go-to, for your busy lifestyle. 

Our soups are ultra compact, light and travel friendly and have a shelf-life of up to 18 months. They are great for travel and even emergencies when your fridge is empty, you're coffee'd out and you crave something savory, healthy and delicious. All you need is hot water, and voila! fresh soup ready to eat in 10 seconds.

L: Alex, C: Elly, R: Tsubi at Expo West 

We love what we do and our happy customers are the only reason why we keep working hard at what we do.

HOW TSUBI SOUP BEGAN

My name is Tsubi. It's short for Tsubasa. I used to eat a lot of meat and dairy, but a series of health issues led me to a plant-based diet. I was in my early 30's and was willing to try anything. After just a few weeks of eating balanced, whole plant-foods, I noticed a spike in my energy, mental sharpness and overall drive. So I started seeking out plant-based snacks and instant soups that I could enjoy with my busy schedule. I was horrified to find that all the instant soups I tried tasted terrible, and many were made with highly processed ingredients of unknown origins. This ignited a fire in me, and led me to find my true calling: creating delicious plant-based soups made from clean and traceable ingredients! 

WHAT'S SPECIAL?

Following my Japanese roots, I began making soups with Japanese miso, an ancient paste made from fermented soybeans which is packed with natural probiotics and enzymes.  The miso used in Tsubi Soup has been made by the same family since the 1800's Edo period. Instead of using seafood for the dashi — a fundamental stock in Japanese cuisine that adds depth and savory flavor — I created the umami essence using wild seaweed and shiitake mushrooms. This plant-based dashi is the foundation of TSUBI SOUP’s three flavors, each one featuring unique miso blends and original, gourmet vegetable toppings that are fully traceable from farm to fork.  

TSUBI SOUPs are then freeze-dried, compressed into cubes and individually packed into single servings. This makes them ultra-light, mess-free, and easy to grab on the go. Below are our three original flavors. As you can see, there are chunky ingredients loaded into each cube. 

Freeze drying also helps to maintain the ingredients’ molecular structure and nutritional integrity. This is a major reason why space explorers take freeze dried foods into space. Every cube is jam-packed with veggies, whose vibrant colors and textures magically come to life with the touch of boiling water.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

｀

WHY MADE IN JAPAN? 

Our recipes are very simple, yet each hand picked ingredient plays an important role in the flavors and the dimensions. We use only supply chain traceable ingredients from ISO regulated, trusted suppliers in Japan, where the highest quality ingredients, advanced technology, unbeatable pride in craftsmanship, and strict quality control are the norm. This adherence to excellence is why Tsubi’s production is currently — and will always be — based in Japan. Our U.S. headquarters acts as the exclusive importer and distributor which then branches Tsubi Soup to the world.

Pic: L: Tsubi, R:Alex 

 

WHERE WE ARE NOW

We’ve been making our gourmet, plant-based miso soups for three years — and have come a long way since our first trade show, where we stuffed thousands of soup samples into suitcases and nervously shared TSUBI SOUP with the world for the first time. Today, multiple trade shows, vegan events and hundreds of in-store demos later, we’ve been able to reach a diverse audience of customers who truly love our concept and brand. We are super lucky and grateful to have such a supportive, organic fanbase around the world. 

 

We’ve sold over 250,000 soups across the globe — and now we're available in some of the most incredible and innovative plant-focused stores in America (including 27 Whole Foods in the New England area alone!).  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Thank you for reading

The last three years have been an amazing journey of triumphs and challenges and many learning experiences. We've evolved so much as a company and see incredible opportunities to grow our brand to become a household name. Tsubi Soup has been proudly self funded all the way, but this time we need your help to keep spreading this plant-based journey. We realize that we just can't do it alone, and with your support, we can keep this dream alive. Our mission is to continue bringing incredible plant-based soups to the world while also contributing to our environment, focusing on food chain transparency and most importantly, adding nourishment and convenience to your daily meals.

Because great vegan food is great for you, great for the animals, and wonderful for the planet.
